111.content:
The Agreement

Kyle was more than a little down on his luck. He thought it was bad enough when he lost his job, but everything just seemed to get worse from there. Already living pay check to pay check, there was no way he was going to be able to pay rent for his apartment this month, and his landlord was as unforgiving as they come. No doubt he would be out on the street within the week. Having just moved into town to "start a new adventure", he had no real friends yet, and no family to fall back on. Needless to say, he was SOL.

Running a hand through the short brown curls of his hair, he searched the internet, hoping to find some solution to his problem before the internet company cut him off from lack of payment. He sighed as he felt like tugging his hair out at the roots. "I don't need a job 3 months from now, I need something now..." He needed something to hold him over, and that was assuming he could get any of these positions in the first place.

"Maybe there's something in the classifieds... Hopefully people still use the newspaper for odd jobs..." Dejectedly, the 22-year-old forced his lanky body into action, making his way to the apartment door, happy to find as he opened it that at least the newspaper company hadn't yet stopped their services. Taking the paper back in with him, he tore through the classifieds, crossing off ad after ad, until before long there was only one ad left.

"'I've never really tried anything like this,'" he read aloud, "'but I'm totally looking for a new roommate! Sorry Ladies, but I'm looking for a guy who needs a place to stay! Hehehe! If you're interested, and you agree to one tiny, little something, you can stay for free! Here's my number...' I'm surprised they even printed this... if even actually says, 'Hehehe,' I mean, come on... This has gotta be some kind of joke. There's no way anyone could take this seriousl--" Just then Kyle was interrupted as he was suddenly standing in darkness; the electric company had apparently waited long enough to get payed. "*Sigh.* That's it then... I guess it's this or nothing... I wonder if I have enough money for a payphone..."

-----------------------------------------

Kyle sighed as he made his way to what was hopefully (or more correctly, 'going to have to be') his new home. He was glad at least that the woman (Jessi was her name) seemed nice enough, and they had gotten along fine, but he was more than a little uneasy about the fact that she wouldn't tell him what the agreement for free rent was until he came over. He shrugged his backpack up higher on his shoulders, the relatively small bag filled with all that was left of his possessions. "At least I made enough money selling stuff off to pay the bill collectors, but this is sort of depressing..." He tried to shrug it off as he made his way into the apartment complex, an old, somewhat aged building in the suburbs of the town.

Reaching to press the elevator call button, he grimaced as he noticed an out of order sign claiming the elevator would be back in service as of May 25th. "That was over a month ago..." "Glad" to see that his luck hadn't changed, Kyle made his way up the six flights of stairs to his new apartment, building up his courage before finally knocking on the door.

As the door flew open, Kyle didn't even get a chance to say "hello" before he was being smothered by a huge pair of breasts. As he panicked and tried to pull away, the woman assaulting him only seemed to squeeze him tighter in a horribly strong bear-hug. "Like, oh my gosh, you really came! This is gonna be soooo awesome! I've done like, a bunch of adds and no one has ever called, and now here you are! And you're not too bad to look at either! Hehehe!"

Kyle in the meantime could barely comprehend her continuous stream of jabbering as he was left with nothing to look at but Jessi's massive cleavage. Past the panic, he couldn't help but enjoy this a little bit, though a fine film of sweat that was being transferred from her boobs to his face kind of killed the moment. When she finally loosened her hold, Kyle came up gasping for air as he finally got a good look at her.

The first thing he noticed was of course, her breasts. At his eye-level, pale white flesh surged and swelled out of the top of a slightly dingy looking spaghetti string top, the white fabric fighting for dear life to hold back her massive mammaries and barely succeeding. At 5'10", Kyle wasn't used to having to look up at people, but Jessi definitely required this. Somehow she was slightly more than a head taller than him, her smiling face framed with blonde hair pulled back in a ponytail beaming at him with 'smiling' green eyes as he realized she was waiting for him to say something.

"Umm... uh... Hi, I'm Kyle... You must be Jessi, right?"

"Yepyep, I know silly! It's sooo awesome you came, KyKy! Come in, come in!" Kyle was about to make a comment about not especially liking the nickname, when he was decidedly distracted as Jessi turned and walked back into the apartment. Though her waist was slightly pudgy, and her Breast Gods had given Jessi way more than a fair share, apparently her lower half had been slightly even more blessed. Clad in a pair of tiny pink boy shorts, her booty exploded from her back like a shelf. Kyle watched, hypnotized, as the massive behind jiggled and jostled like twin jello molds as her cheeks attempted to escape her boy shorts out of the top (and with half of her crack showing, they seemed to be succeeding).

"So whatdayou think of your new home?" Kyle was forced out of his stupor as she turned back to face him, the door closing behind him as his eyes washed over the apartment. One wall was taken over by a small kitchenette and an even smaller bathroom. The rest of the one room apartment was apparently being used as a living room/bedroom/and dining room all in one. A small bed sat opposite a large TV, and Kyle couldn't help but notice that the place was a complete pigsty. Almost every inch of the floor was covered in, by the smell, dirty clothes, and over half the bed seemed to be strewn with discarded taco rappers/bags from Taco Bell.

Appalled, but knowing he needed to keep on Jessi's good side, Kyle took the easy way out. "It's umm... well... it's cozy, I guess."

"Aaww, I knew you'd like it!" Kyle was beginning to be amazed by both the tomboyishness and the air-headedness of this girl. "Come on, sit!" Feeling more than a little awkward, Kyle took a seat at the corner of the bed, noticing how big the TV was in this tiny space just before Jessi plopped herself down right next to him. He couldn't help but fidget as he noticed her thighs and butt rubbing up against his, as his eyes once again lingered on the pile of Taco Bell refuse.

"Did you have someone over a little while ago?"

"Oh, that Taco Bell? No silly, I bought us dinner, but then you took a little longer than I thought you would and I got a little nervous... And I get hungry when I'm nervous, Hehehe. Umm, I think I made sure I left you one..." Kyle's eyes grew wide; she had eaten enough tacos for a whole family!!! "Ah, here it is!" Jessi triumphantly pulled a squished softshell taco from under the pile, thrusting it into Kyle's face as it tripped with grease.

"Umm... No thanks, I ate before I came over."

"Oh, I should have told you I got Taco Bell! Oh well, if you don't want it, more for me! I don't know why my doctor says I shouldn't eat these, they just taste sooooo good!" Kyle watched in mute fascination/horror as Jessi barely got the wrapper off before she scarfed the taco down practically whole, smearing cream cheese and taco grease around her lips and even dropping a dollop onto her cleavage with no attempt to wipe it off.

"So, Jessi... What is it I have to agree to to live here?"

"Oh, hehehe, I was so excited you're here I forgot to tell you! If you decide to live here, I'll totally let you stay for free, and even pay for anything you need or want! All yooou have to do, is be my live-in boyfriend!"
111.title: Chapter 1: The Agreement (Part 1)

1111.content:
Kyle nearly choked on his tongue. Living in this big tomboy's apartment was an awkward enough position, but being her boyfriend?!?! His mind scrambled once again for other options, but of course came up with none. Even with how slobby and tomboyish she seemed to be, her personality and outgoingness were cute, not to mention her amazing body... He looked up to answer and nearly laughed at the pair of puppy dog eyes Jessi was giving him. "I guess if that's all I need to do to live here, I'd be honored."

"Yaaaaaay!!!" Jessi literally jumped for joy, her breasts nearly surging all the way out of her top as the fabric creaked, groaned, and nearly tore in two. This resulted in Kyle getting even more of a facefull of sweaty cleavage as she hugged him again, causing small squelching noises as she squeezed him tighter and tighter. "Oh my gosh, you don't even know how long I've waited to have a boyfriend! I don't get it, I try so hard but they never seem to stick around very long, but you'll be living with me!!! Don't worry, this is going to be great!"

After a couple hours of talking (between smother sessions when Jessi got a 'little' too excited), Kyle found that he and Jessi actually had a lot in common and really got along. In different circumstances (and maybe if she was a little tidier), Kyle found himself thinking that he would have actually asked her out if they had met somewhere.

As they continued to talk, he couldn't help but notice that Jessi seemed to be shifting around uncomfortably. "Are you okay?"

"Oh, yeah, hehehe... Umm... *Shiftshift.* Yeah, I'm fine. I think I just need to umm... use the little girls' room-- I mean, our bathroom."

"Hehe, don't be silly." Finally giving into the urge, Jessi went to stand. As she did, her butt pooched out right in Kyle's face, her shorts sliding lower as her ass surges towards him, nearly looking like her crack is going to engulf him from his perspective. Kyle has just enough time to hear a rumble and then... PPPPHHHRRRRRRRRAAASSSTTTTTTTT!!!

Kyle nearly threw up as the most disgusting smell ever blasts him square in the face, getting into his eyes, nose, even his mouth. Jessi looked over her shoulder at him, blushing from head to toe (even her pale white butt cheeks going a shade of pink). "Oh my god, I'm soooo sorry KyKy!!! Sometimes it happens when I eat tacos... Or pretty much any time I eat anything..."

Kyle wanted to run out and never come back, but he had nowhere to go, and not to mention he had just agreed to be her boyfriend and he'd be living with her. Deciding it'd be better to avoid conflict, he tried to brush it off, even as the smell was still lingering. "Don't *cough* worry about it... It didn't even really smell, and it's not like it's a big deal even if it did..."

"Oh thank god, I knew you were going to be a great boyfriend KyKy!" Before Kyle could respond, there was another, much bigger rumble, followed by a very wet SSSPPPPRRRRRAAAPPPSSSSTTTTT!!! He felt like his face was melting off as Jessi ripped an even worse fart again right in his face before she walked towards the bathroom, apparently taking what he said as meaning what she did was just fine between them.

Kyle tried as best he could to wave the stink away, but it seemed permanently fused to his nose no matter what he did. He was only distracted when Jessi got into the bathroom and turned around to start pulling down her boy shorts. "Umm... Jessi, what are you doing?"

"Oh, hehe, I forgot to tell you, there's no door for the bathroom. That's kinda why I've been holding this in, I didn't know how to bring it up... But if I already farted in your face twice and it's no big deal, then just watch TV and imagine it's me doing that!" Kyle had to fight back the urge to puke again at the thought, but as her big butt sealed itself to the toilet, he tried as best he could to watch the news that was on and not look at her.

"In our latest story tonight, a local man jumps from a 7 seven-story window to escape his --" SSSSLLLLLLLOOOOOOORRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPSSSSSSHHHHHHH!!!

If he thought the sound of her explosive crap blasting into the toilet was bad, it was nothing compared to when she shifted and the smell leaked out. It was like when she farted in his face the second time, if he had been burying his face in her butt cheeks instead of just being near them. Forcing himself not to say anything and not to look, Kyle turned up the volume on the TV.

"In other news, a woman in the nearby county of-- PPPRRFFFTT --is attempting to boycott string cheese in an effort to--" SSSSPPPPRRRRROOOOOMMMMMFFFFFSLLLLLLSSSHHHH!!! Barely keeping himself from looking, Kyle is reeling from the smell that is filling the room, and only getting worse by the minute. Jessi courtesy flushes, sending sickening bubbling noises throughout the apartment as the toilet struggles to process her slimy, soupy mixture and barely succeeds. The smell doesn't diminish, however, and it actually seems to get worse as the stink circulates throughout the small area.

Giving one last valiant effort to "ignore" Jessi's emissions, Kyle turns the volume all the way up on the TV. "--MAN DIED TODAY FROM EATING TOO MUCH BROCCOLI, A SHOCKING REPORT LATER TONI--" SSSPPPPRRRRROOOOSSSSHHHH!!! SSSPPPREEEEEEENNNNN!!! SSSSHLLLOOOORRRFFFTTTTPPLOOOMTTTTSHHHHHHsppreeeeenplopplop... FFFRT!!! *Splash.*

As Jessi sighs in relief of pushing out the last of her nasty delivery, Kyle can no longer take it and glances over, and immediately can't look away. Like a car crash, his eyes lock on against his will. The toilet seems to be giving up the fight under Jessi's bulk, barely containing the bulk of her sludge even after the courtesy flush, and as it starts to leak slightly from overflow, Kyle can't imagine what the seat must look like.

Convincing himself that he has nowhere else to go anyway, Kyle forces a smile and forces himself to cover up his disgust as he turns down the TV. "Don't... *coughcough* worry about it... I mean, *snifflecough* shit happens, right?"

Kyle can't help but smile genuinely as he still chokes on the smell, until to his horror Jessi gets up and, forgetting or ignoring the lack of toilet paper, pulls her boy shorts back up with a horrid *Squeeelch.* "Hehehe, you're like, the best boyfriend ever, KyKy!" Kyle sighed as Jessi watched TV, while all he could watch was her back/the back of her head and listen to her shimmy back and forth on his lap. If this is what was happening the first day he's here, this was going to be a very... "interesting" relationship.

112.content:
Sleeping Arrangements

Kyle sighed with relief as Jessi finally got up off of him, giving him a “great” view once again of her still ridiculously dirty bum. They had spent the last few more hours of Kyle “watching TV together” (which in reality was her watching TV and constantly chattering while he put up with her shifting and grinding her soiled butt into him with his vision filled by her back and hair). He was at least happy to see that Jessi’s ass seemed, at least relatively, cleaner, until he looked down and realized why.

Apparently the uncovered section of Jessi’s crack had been up against the front of Kyle’s shirt, and Jessi’s constant wiggling and grinding had caused it to be makeshift toilet paper. Most of his shirt now had a giant smearing of the brown/green stuff. Apparently Jessi had noticed as well. “Like, oh my gosh!!! I’m so, so, soooo sorry, KyKy! I knew I should have bought some toilet paper, but I always end up getting distracted and forgetting! I’ll toootally by you a new shirt when we go shopping sometime soon!!!”

Kyle was of course more than a little disgusted, and he wanted to be mad at her, but one look into her angelic face that screamed, “I’m sorry,” immediately made him think better of it. He was starting to get good at forcing smiles. “Well, it’s just a shirt, and I never liked this one anyway. Heck, if I had the money, I would have thrown it away a lot sooner.” This was a lie of course, it was actually Kyle’s favorite shirt, but a shirt WAS just a shirt…

Jessi was nearly in tears of joy as her face broke into one of the biggest smiles Kyle had ever seen. “Hehehe, well don’t worry, I’ll buy you a new shirt every time that happens, KK?” Kyle couldn’t help but smile in spite of himself, the fact of her statement suggesting that this may be a regular occurrence not being lost on him. He wasn’t sure yet if this agreement was a godsend or a deal with the devil, but he had to admit that he was starting to have a weakness for making Jessi smile even as she was making him almost lose his lunch.

Shaking his head, Kyle gingerly started undoing his shirt, not wanting to get any more of the refuse on his hands than he absolutely had too. With his shirt half unbuttoned, Kyle looked up to see Jessi staring at him in complete rapture; at least until she noticed he was looking back. Startled, her breasts and buns were sent a-jiggling like mad as she quickly turned around and covered her face, showing off her trademark full-body blush as she burst into another barrage of nearly incoherent words. “OhmygoshI’msorryIshouldn’thavebeenlookingIshouldhaveclosedmyeyesorsomethi ngbutI’venever… I’ve never…”

Kyle arched an eyebrow, still not exactly sure what he had done to get this reaction. “Never… what?”

Though he couldn’t see her face, Kyle could just imagine the pouting/semi-ashamed face Jessi made as she answered. “I’ve never… seen a guy undress.”

It was all Kyle could do not to bust out laughing, but he couldn’t stop a small snicker from escaping. He was immediately assaulted by the most perfectly poochy pouty face ever. “Don’t laugh at me… Meany Head.” But as she noticed he had opened the rest of his shirt and was in the process of taking it off, her body was quickly washed an even deeper shade of red as she quickly turned away again.

Kyle couldn’t hold back the laugh any more. As he laughed and Jessi continued to pout and fidget, he couldn’t help but notice how innocently cute she was (and inversely, how at the same time she could be completely oblivious to how she carried her OWN body). “Hahaha. Come on, Jessi, it’s not like I was taking my pants off. Then again… it is about time for bed.” Kyle didn’t think it was possible, but Jessi’s body immediately went an even deeper red, her butt cheeks practically glowing.

Giving her a break from his teasing, Kyle decided it was time to bid his shirt a fond farewell. “Anyway, do you have a garbage can somewhere?” Jessi seemed more than a little relieved for the change of conversation, though Kyle was pleased to see her taking quick glances over her shoulder at him as she replied, still refusing to turn around.

“Yes, I mean, I had one… I’m not sure where it is… I’m pretty sure I had one last week…” Kyle was wondering how she could lose a garbage can in such a small space, until he saw the especially large pile of dirty clothes that had accumulated in one of the corners and hadn’t yet spilled onto the floor.

He should have known better than to disturb the pile’s slumber, but before he could think better of it, Kyle reach out and shoved the top half of the pile to the floor. He was happy to find he was right as he saw part of the garbage can sticking up, but two seconds later he was regretting it. Not only was his hand greasy and sweaty from the god-knows-how-old dirty clothes pile, Kyle had inadvertently released the stink that had been trapped inside. His head was spinning as the smell of decaying BO attacked him full force.

“Oh! You found it! Goody!” Jessi had apparently worked up the courage to turn around and be able to talk fairly normal, though now her eyes were roaming more than ever and she hadn’t gotten any less red. “I’ve been using it for a dirty clothes basket, but go ahead and toss your shirt in there, I have plenty of clean clothes to wear! Hehehe!”

Kyle’s eyes quickly swept the room again, and sure enough he didn’t see anything the resembled a dresser or closet. Which meant… she actually thought all the clothes strewn all over the apartment were clean?! He sighed in exasperation as Jessi proved once again just how oblivious she really was. As he reached towards the lid of the garbage can, a chill ran down his body. If she thought these obviously dirty clothes were clean… how bad did something have to be for her to think it was dirty? Glancing back to see Jessi preoccupied with openly checking him out again, Kyle forced down his growing dread and, braving the smell of the “clean” clothes pile, opened the lid.

If he had thought that the smell of the clothes pile was bad, he had had no idea. The smell assaulting every part of his being at the moment was something like mixing a bag full of used gym clothes with an abandoned gas station bathroom, then having someone eat that mixture and throw it back up again. He tossed his shirt into the bin blindly, his eyes watering too much too see (which thankfully meant he didn’t have to look at anything inside). Even though it had only taken him a few seconds to dispose of his soiled shirt, the stench was proving too much for him. Kyle took a few steps back, tripping over an errant T-shirt, and before he knew it he was out cold on the floor, the expanse of dirty clothes at least breaking his fall.

Jessi seemed unconcerned with Kyle’s fall, flashing another smile as she looked down at his passed out form. “Aaww, he must be like, totally exhausted after all of the excitement today! Hehehe, he’s definitely a keeper. Too bad he didn’t fall onto the bed though… I mean, no, that’s bad, bad, bad!” Her body had finally gotten back to its pale shade, but was once again washed in pink. “At least I get to sleep in the same room with him, hehehe. I can’t wait until tomorrow!” Feeling a bit tired herself, Jessi soon turned off the TV and the overhead light, taking one last long guilty look at Kyle before pushing the Taco Bell wrappers off the end of the bed and plopping herself onto the sweat-stained sheets. Today was the best day she had ever had, and she was optimistic that every day from here out was just going to get better. A content smile washed over her face as she drifted off to dreamland.
112.title: Chapter 2: Sleeping Arrangements

1121.content:
Kyle startled awake, having just woken up from a nightmare about Jessi wanting him to clean her toes with his tongue. He could almost still taste the toe jam… Wait… He spit violently as he realized he had somehow rolled in his sleep and filled his mouth with an inside-out sock, the toe section rubbing all over his tongue. “I’m gonna have to work on cleaning all of this up sometime… or at least not pass out on the floor.

After a valid attempt to scrape the taste of Jessi’s foot off his tongue ended in failure, Kyle finally noticed that it was dark; well, mostly dark. He couldn’t help but chuckle as even with the room entirely in disarray, no clothes were blocking a nightlight plugged in low on the wall. In the soft glow, he could see Jessi’s sleeping form. On her side facing away from him, her hips jutted up from the bed like no other, her dirty butt shifting slightly with her breathing, and Kyle couldn’t help but take a moment to admire her form (minus the dirtiness) while he took off his shoes and sock to make himself more comfortable.

Getting up and setting his shoes near his backpack by the door, he made his way to the bathroom, and –*Squish*… immediately regretted taking his shoes off. How could he have forgotten about her recent bowel movement already? Maybe Jessi was rubbing off on him… Or maybe he had blocked it out. He was glad at least that the smell wasn’t as strong, though the disgusting sludge on his foot told him that the toilet had continued to leak after she had walked out.

As his eyes adjusted to the darkness, the extent of the mess slowly came into focus. The toilet had completely overflowed, chunky diarrhea water having spread to most of the bathroom floor. At first he thought there was no toilet seat, but he soon realized that is was slick with crap, the once white porcelain now a sickly shade of brown/green, and a lot of the tank wasn’t much better. Choking back his dinner from the feel Jessi’s crap between his toes alone, Kyle sighed as he realized that if he wanted to pee, he was going to have to clean this up.

“First… Ick… I’ll have to unclog this thing…” Luckily, behind the toilet there was a plunger (albeit a VERY used one), unfortunately, it too had crap leaked all over it. Picking it up as gingerly as he could, Kyle reached into the small nearby walk-in shower and turned on the water, washing at least the handle off as best he could. “I swear, if you weren’t so cute, and I didn’t need a place to stay…” Kyle couldn’t finish his thought as he imagined Jessi’s facial expression, and was immediately defeated. “Let’s just get it over with…”

The toilet was so backed up, that even just introducing the plunger caused more overflow, splashing onto his already disgusting feet. The smell was horrible, but there was nothing he could do about it as he was forced to use both hands to pump the plunger, which splattered backsplash all over his pants, yet another piece of clothing Jessi had claimed.

Finally satisfied that the toilet would flush, Kyle tossed the plunger under the running showerhead. “Moment of truth…” Pressing the handle, Kyle half imagined the toilet exploding and spraying everywhere, but after a few disgusting bubbling sounds, the toilet finally started to process the mass, although very slowly. Kyle couldn’t help but do a fist-pump in victory, but this proved to be his undoing as the excessive amount of waste still under his feet caused them to slip right out from under him.

Time slowed down around him as Kyle fell, his destination pre-determined by some angry god as he first fell to his knees. He tried to catch himself, but the filth-slick surfaces of the bathroom offered him no help, and he was forced to watch in horror as he faceplanted into the still nearly full toilet bowl. Coming up sputtering for air and spitting out cold diarrhea/water, Kyle immediately wanted to dive into the shower and turn the water up to scalding, but he realized he would immediately be dirty again as soon as he stepped out.

After desperately fighting his dinner down multiple times, he looked around and was glad to notice a pile of only slightly used towels in the bathroom corner that had escaped the shitstorm unscathed. He did his best to use one to get the shit off of his face and out of his hair as the toilet continued making its disgusting slurping sounds behind him. Working up whatever gusto he still had, he forced himself to finish the job as he used the rest of the towels to wipe up the entire bathroom.

As the toilet finally cleared out, Kyle was amazed at how Jessi had slept through the entire thing. Taking off his pants and using one of the towels to wipe off his feet too not drag shit into the apartment, he and bundled up both with all of the other towels and placed them in the “dirty clothes basket”, making sure this time to plug his nose and be even quicker about closing the lid. As Kyle admired his handiwork, he couldn’t help but have an inkling suspicion that it would all be undone before he knew it.

Shaking his head and finally taking the piss that had started all this hardship, Kyle soon jumped in the shower, nearly burning himself trying to make sure not a speck of crap was left on him.


Kyle wiped himself dry with one of the last remaining towels, not too happy with the smell of BO that was coming off of it, but just glad it wasn’t shit, and didn’t smell anywhere near as strong. Grabbing his backpack, Kyle turned on the light as he searched for a new pair of boxers and slipped them on, the light apparently stirring Jessi out of her deep slumber.

Kyle had every intention of telling her off, or at least telling her what he had to put up with. But as she rolled over to squint over at him standing in the bathroom doorway, her hair in a tussle and rubbing one eye sleepily, he once again couldn’t bring himself to crush this girl. “Kyky… *Yawn.* What’s wrong?” Kyle was trying to think of what to say when his thoughts were stopped dead in their tracks. Apparently her cami had finally given up the fight, at least partially. As she turned, one of her breasts flopped free of the cami’s cup, bouncing and swaying with the slightest shift. Even out of the cami, it seemed to defy gravity, the giant orb much to perky for something its size. He was snapped out of his stupor as he noticed Jessi had the same expression he must have had. “Yo—y-y-y-you’re… *Gulp.* You’re in your… your boxers!!!”

Kyle was stunned. Now fully awake, she still seemed oblivious to her own body, even as she was freaking out about something much less… risqué. Trying to keep Jessi from going into another blushing fit, Kyle quickly made something up to answer her question. “Yeah, I’m sorry… I umm… I was having trouble sleeping on the floor, so I decided to take a shower. Oh, and umm… your boob kind of…”

FFRRRAAAAPPPPTTT!!! SSPPPRRRROOMMMFFFTTT!!! FFFFRRRRSSSHHHHHHTTTT!!! 113111.content:
“Hehehe, see? I dunno what the docs are talking about; it only gave me a little bit of upset stomach!” Yanking the entire roll off the spool once again, Jessi was reaching back to wipe her brown/green stained cheeks when both her and Kyle heard an ominous rumble. “Umm… Hehehe… I guess we might want to move to that last stall, KyKy.” Kyle tried to protest as yet again Jessi through the entire unused roll in a tangled wad on the floor, to desperate to listen to his please as she shoved him into the last stall, her now very dirty ass chasing him in. Kyle tried to get her to let him pass, but she heard none of it. “Sorry, KyKy, I like, totally need to concentrate.”

Kyle despaired at yet another horrible situation he had gotten in with this girl, and it only got worse. After tensing and pushing a few times to no avail, Jessi started doubling over more and more with each push, each time pushing harder and harder with no results. Kyle had finally forced himself to look somewhere, anywhere else, but after a few moments he looked ahead, hopeful that it was all a false alarm, only to see Jessi bent so fart over that her ass was now off the toilet and pointing straight at him!!! “No, Jessi, don—“

SSSPPPPPLLLOOOOORTTTTSSSSHHHHHHHPPLAAAFFFTTTPPRRROMMFFFF!!! Kyle was subjected to one of the worst sights and experiences imaginable as Jessi blasted diarrhea in every direction behind her, covering the entire toilet and Kyle’s front from his chest down, turning the red and black of his clothes a sickly brown and making the floor and wall slick with her filth. SSSPPPPRRRAAAAPPPPSSSSSHHHHHTTTTTSPPRROMMMFFFPRrrroommptsshhhhhhSPLORTSPRAFT!!!< br />
With a final massive trumpeting, Jessi put one last coating of diarrhea green onto everything, sighing in more than obvious relief as she started to wipe, once again pulling out the entire roll to Kyle’s diarrhea covered dismay. Using every bit of the massive wad to wipe up her even more massive dirty ass, Jessi soon let the mess fall into the toilet, her butt mostly clean as she flushed and the toilet clogged and started overflowing from the toilet paper alone.


Turning around with a contented giggle, Jessi startled at seeing the state of Kyle’s clothes, but only for a moment. “Oopsie, hehehe, I guess that’s the danger of escorting me into a bathroom. But that’s what makes you so awesome KyKy! Don’t worry, like I said, we can go shopping sometime soon and I can replace any other clothes that happens too!” Kyle once again nearly threw up thinking about all the ways his clothes would most likely be ruined with this girl, but convinced himself that at least her shit wasn’t on his face and hair this time.

Kyle was left more than a little stunned as Jessi proceeded to pull up her skirt with a few mighty yanks all on her own, which essentially meant Kyle had been put through this for no reason in the first place. “Anyway, let’s go home! After a big meal like that I think a nap’ll be perfect! And of course… you’re umm… you’refreetojoinme!” Blushing profusely, Jessi grabbed Kyle’s hand and led him out of the restaurant, with Kyle dragging dejectedly behind her.

“If she wasn’t so damn cute…” Kyle mumbled to himself, though he knew that if he had taken all of this already and not left, there was little chance of him escaping.

Breaking her train of revenge, her manager called from the back room, saying there was a costumer complaint about the ladies’ room. With an angry sigh, Lisa grabbed the plunger from the supply closet. “No doubt that huge pig plugged up one of the toilets like she was in there…”

But what Lisa found when she entered was a complete war zone. Shit was everywhere, toilet water was flowing all over the floor, and toilet paper was unrolled and tossed everywhere as well. The smell hit her so hard she nearly passed out, her anger and disgust growing to a brand new height. “Scratch spitting in his food, I’m shitting all over it and calling it special sauce…”

114.content:
A New Arrival: Part 1

When Jessi and Kyle arrived home, he immediately changed out of yet another bunch of ruined clothes into a simple blue button-up shirt and a pair of faded jeans, washing his shoes to the best of his abilities.

Asking if he could use Jessi’s internet, Kyle used her bright pink laptop while she took her nap (only barely able to resist her puppy-dog face as she fell asleep with him on the corner of the mattress), Kyle attempted to find a job, ANY job. Sure, he couldn’t go so far as to run out on Jessi completely, but maybe if he could get a job and get another apartment, he could see more of Jessi’s cute side and less of her disgusting parts… Ignoring the large Jessi + Kyle with a heart around it that was Jessi’s desktop picture (which she must have put in before they had even actually met), Kyle frustratingly searched and sent off a few resumes. With most summer jobs already filled and any others scouting for openings that wouldn’t happen for months out, he didn’t expect much.

With a sigh of resignation, Kyle thought about getting a nap himself, but wasn’t given much of a choice as Jessi suddenly yanked him from behind and snuggled him like a teddy bear once again; a contented smile painted on her sleeping face. Jessi continued to sleep, but Kyle received none, getting another smothering from Jessi’s sweat and leftover food-smeared body. When she finally woke up, he was just glad that her sleep had been apparently dreamless and it hadn’t been worse.

*Yawn.* “Hey, KyKy, decided to join me after all, huh? Hehehe, well thank you, that was like, the best nap ever!”

Kyle pulled himself away from her with a forced smile, a squelch of suction from Jessi’s sweaty body almost sticking him to her. “So hey, I was like, wondering if you might want to go to the gym with me? They just opened nearby, and I absolutely looove it there! Hehehe.”

Kyle almost agreed, but bit his tongue hard. Jessi had already proven her “talent” at making an otherwise normal time completely shitty (in both senses of the word), what would happen if he went with her to a place where people were already supposed to be sweaty and disgusting? “Umm… well, you know I’d love to, but… I’m actually still pretty tired; exciting day and everything, you know.”

“Aawww, so you really liked our date, even with the pit-stop? Hehehe, you’re the best KyKy!!! Alrighty, I’ll let you relax, and I’ll go work up a sweat!” Kyle couldn’t help but sigh as she both took what he said the wrong way AND gave him a disgusting image of an even sweatier version of her working out. He was just glad she hadn’t begged him to go, which he didn’t know if he could resist twice in a row.

His thoughts were interrupted by an audible squishing and squelching sound as Jessi grabbed seemingly well used (and still dirty) gym clothes and stuff them into a backpack. “Last time I was there, someone asked me if I wash my clothes like, once a month! Hehehe, can you imagine? Of course not! I mean, if you take in clean stuff every couple of months, you don’t have to worry about your clothes being too dirty!” Kyle was floored, but quickly realized he shouldn’t be surprised. Happy he had dodged the bullet at least this time, Kyle waved goodbye to Jessi as she jiggled out the door, the backpack full to bursting with “clean” clothes.

Jumping back onto the internet once Jessi was gone, Kyle was excited to see that he had received a reply for a job opening! Immediately calling the number in the e-mail, he was quickly set up with an interview; they had even agreed to see him in just an hour!

Knowing there was no way he could go in his now wrinkled and sweat/food stained clothes, Kyle went to grab his backpack… only to find it wasn’t there. Assuming it had been buried in one of the many piles of dirty clothes, Kyle systematically worked his way through the mess, holding his nose and cleaning as best he could as he went. Not having any clothes bins (besides the dreaded garbage can that no doubt was even more disgusting by now), Kyle did his best to make semi-neat organized piles by color and if they were delicates or not (he fought both the urge to blush and hurl as he grabbed each of the overly used panties and bras). By the end of it, Kyle was proud of how much cleaner the room looked, but crestfallen at a realization…

Jessi had taken his backpack, and he only had about a half an hour until his interview!!! He could only hope that her “clean” gym clothes hadn’t completely soaked all of his, and that he could find Jessi quick enough to still make it!

Luckily, he knew of the gym she had been talking about, and with an uneventful sprint, Kyle arrived making good time. Running into the large gym, he tried his best to look for Jessi. After looking into multiple weight rooms, tracks, and basketball courts, Kyle still had had no luck; but he was starting to think that was a good thing. More than a few women were working hard in the rooms he peaked his head into, from skinny to chubby to downright fat, and all of them were drenched in sweat and filling the rooms with a strong smell of BO. If more normal girls were working up this much of a sweat/stink, what would it be like to see Jessi actually working out?! Not to mention if she spotted him, there was no chance she would let him leave without joining her…
With a sigh and only 20 minutes to go until his interview, Kyle made a bold decision. She had talked about bringing clothes in every couple of months, which meant she must have a locker so… He would have to sneak in and find it. Normally he would never do something so brazen, but after getting smothered, gassed, and above all shit on multiple times, there wasn’t much a guy wouldn’t be willing to do to get out of that situation.

Using every ounce of stealth (and courage) he could muster, Kyle watched for an opening and when the coast was clear he quickly made his way inside. With a sigh of relief, Kyle found that the stars had aligned and the locker room of this apparently very busy gym was completely empty.

Acting quickly, Kyle began to look into row upon row of lockers, hoping that the same luck that had left the locker room deserted would lead him to Jessi’s. But after looking into a dozen rows of lockers, and seeing (and smelling) more than his fair share of used gym clothes and attire, Kyle was still no closer to getting his backpack back. With only 10 minutes left until his interview, he needed to cut down his search area. Suddenly spying a member’s only reserve section, Kyle made his way over to the slightly large lockers.

Luckily, a few of them were unlocked (and you hoped with Jessi’s obliviousness she wouldn’t think to get a lock). Though most were fairly clean, many had discarded gym clothes that must have been sitting for a while now, the smell nearly bowling him over each time he opened one of these lucky “containers”.

Opening the last locker in this row, Kyle nearly hurled. The clothes inside were so disgusting they were practically decaying, all of them completely worn out and raunchy with BO and sweat. Kyle was about to slam it shut, when he suddenly heard someone enter the locker room. “I know working out is good for ze body, but why must it be so tiring?”

Panicking upon hearing the European accent he can’t quite place at the thought of being caught in a women’s locker room like this, Kyle did the only thing he can think of. Turning, he bends and shimmies himself into the waist high locker, pressing himself to the back of the locker and pulling his knees to his chest, slamming the door behind him. Kyle can hardly move an inch in his dank hiding spot, the smell almost as bad as Jessi’s “dirty clothes bin”. As what must be days old sweat starts seeping through his clothes, Kyle is thankful for the small air vent slits at his eye level, letting him see out and giving him fresh air in the otherwise solid locker, no matter how little. Wishing he had been cooler under pressure and moved to a less disgusting locker, Kyle looked out as best he could through the slits, and saw the woman who had interrupted him.

She was beautiful, to say the least. Red hair in long red curls cascaded down her shoulders, framing an almost regal face with silver eyes. She carried herself almost like royalty, and she definitely had a body to carry. Her breasts were large to say the least, bouncing hypnotically in a sweat-drenched green sports bra, cleavage showing out of the top wiggling with every shift.

Her chest sloped into a relatively tiny waist, her abs chiseled and her skin tan. A pair of black stretchy workout shorts adorned her explosive backside, finishing out the extreme hourglass shape of her otherwise toned body. It was obvious that she tanned and worked out quite often, though her breasts and bum seemed to be immune to any calorie burning she did. Though her assets were smaller than Jessi’s (and whose weren’t?), since she appeared to be Kyle’s height, the extreme transition from the wide points of her hourglass to the toned parts of her body made them look enormous.
114.title: Chapter 4: A New Arrival Part 1

1141.content:
Kyle fought the urge to drool as this European beauty walked closer, giving him a wonderful profile from his covert position. His eyes grew wider as she stopped right in front of the locker he was in, and nearly exploded out of his head as she bent down to untie her shoes, her cleavage bobbing and weaving in front of his face. Mouth wide open, Kyle only stopped staring when she suddenly opened the locker he was in.

Kyle froze, unsure of what to do. He was sure she had seen him, but apparently was wrong as she tossed her shoes and socks in without looking and slammed the door again. Kyle sighed in utter relief, but soon was assaulted by one of the rankest foot odors he had ever bared witness to. The shoes had plopped next to his feet, foot stink wafting up out of them like some sick overpowering air freshener. He had been so shocked at her opening the locker, that he hadn’t noticed one of her crew-cut workout socks had plastered itself on his shoulder, and the other was soaking his hair. In disgust he tried to move to get them off, but found he couldn’t move his arms enough. Wiggling, he only succeeded in causing the sock on his head to slowly slide down his face, before thankfully falling on top of the shoes, its pair still sitting on his shoulder and drenching his shirt.

However, Kyle was soon distracted as the red-headed bombshell wiggled her butt at the locker, yanking down (with some amount of effort) the small workout shorts. Kyle stared in disbelief as her butt seemed to jump out at him and get even bigger, her perfectly tanned cheeks doing their best to devour a tiny pair of white lace panties. Before he could think how odd this was to wear to work out, Kyle was given another heart attack as the woman opened the locker once again.

Kyle closed his eyes and braced himself for being found, but instead he only got slapped in the face with a sopping wet article of clothing before she shut him in again. At first the suffocating feeling of having a sweat-soaked pair of shorts plastered to his face was the worst; that is until the smell of both horribly fresh BO and rank ass nearly burned his nose off. Flailing like mad, he still managed to get some of the butt sweat in his mouth before the shorts finally peeled off and fell away.

As his eyes cleared from the burning salt of this woman’s ass sweat, Kyle’s vision cleared just in time for a perfect view of said ass leaning towards the locker vents. Kyle’s eyes grew wider the more her bum cheeks spread, until with a squeak of sweaty flesh on metal, her ass sealed off the vents, giving Kyle not much else to look at except her lace covered crack. “And of course, all zese men, zey drool over moi from afar, only to get cold feet once zey realize how sweaty and bad smelling I am.”

Kyle could understand why as the smell of ass crack and sweat only grew in his hiding place. “I mean, I did not even pass gas very much out zere today!” Kyle felt dread wash over him before suddenly… PPPHHHHRRRRAAAASSSHHHHHTTTTT!!! “Aahh… Oui, zat is what zey should have to put up with to be with someone as beautiful as moi.” FFFRRRRRPPPPTTTTTSssssssssssssprrrrooop…

Kyle was sent reeling as the gas sprayed him continuously at point blank, her ass sealing off any fresh air and forcing him to breathe the rank stuff and listen to her talk to herself. BLLOOOORRRSSSHHHTTT!!! “My father always said zat I would never get a man if I did not learn to control my ‘bad habits’, but he does not know what he speaks of! Someday soon, I shall find a man who will know how much my beauty is worth. He will put up with any level of nastiness because my beauty and allure shall overpower all else!” PPPPRRRAAAAPPPTTTTTPPPRRRRROOOMMMMFFFFpppreeeeeeeen…

Kyle nearly hurled as he thought that it wouldn’t matter if she was the most beautiful and alluring being on earth, if she smelled this bad everyone would run away. He wasn’t even sure how he was still conscious as her horrible gas continued to fill his hiding-spot-turned-prison. When she leans forward, Kyle can practically taste the clean air just on the other side of the vent. Nearly plastering his lips and nose to the slits, he took deep breaths, only to suck in hard as she pushed her but out one last time with perfect aim before… PPPLLOOOORRSSSSHHHHPPRRROROOOMMMMTTTTBBBRRRRRRAAAAAPPPPPTTTTFFLLLLLrrrrrrrrrtprr ttpromp…

Kyle recoiled as he coughed and choked, his nose melting off and his tongue dying in his mouth as the woman seemed to finally notice his presence. “What in ze hell? Who are you? What… what are you doing in zere?” Even in this horrendous situation, Kyle had to fight distraction as the woman was required to bend over slightly to see him over her breasts, swaying like fleshy pendulums. It even almost made him forget the smell that thankfully was slowly dissipating with the locker door now open… Almost. “No doubt you are here to admire my magnificent beauty… But, as is always the case with you shallow men, you will not be able to put up with even a single one of my… ‘habits’.”

Extracting himself with some amount of effort from the locker, Kyle stood up in front of the woman, nearly hitting his head on her jiggling pair in the process. Though he was definitely in a compromising position, Kyle couldn’t help but feel indignant at being looked down upon by this royal wannabe, and his mouth opened of its own accord. “I think I’ve had to put up with quite enough, actually. I was just trying to find something so I could get to a job interview, and now I’ve not only had to put up with you tossing your completely sweat-soaked gym clothes all over me, including your shorts to my face, but also a horrible barrage of your completely disgusting farts!”

The woman looked at him in confusion, Kyle himself shocked into silence at his own outburst. After a more than awkward pause, the woman spoke up. “So… You hid in my locker, with all of my old gym clothes… then let moi throw my dirty gym clothes on you, and my shorts right on your face… and you sat in silence as I passed wind all over you, all with you only getting just a glimpse of my beauty?”

“I… Well, I guess you could put it that way…”

Kyle was thinking now might be a good time to run, when the silver-eyed woman suddenly burst into a genuine, yet still somehow regal, smile. “Finally, I have found someone who appreciates what one needs to go through to be around someone as beautiful as moi!” Kyle could only stand and blink in bewilderment. Had he somehow complimented this girl with his outburst? “You have earned an introduction. I am Alexia, heir to the multi-billion dollar Rothswei family business. Zough I require most men to address me as Miss Rothswei, I believe I shall make an exception for you; you may address me as Alexia. And what might your name be?”

Kyle was still slightly dumbfounded as Alexia gave her introduction, seeming to not only not mind being in front of him in just her sports bra and panties, but enjoying his internal struggle to keep from staring. “Umm… *Cough.* Nice to meet you… I suppose… I’m Kyle… not really the heir to anything I guess…”

Though Alexia had apparently barely allowed him to call her by her first name, she held no such regard for his. “Haha, well Ky, zat is fine. Ze higher class men will never understand what my beauty is worth as you do.” Attempting to ignore yet another woman over-simplifying his already simple name, Kyle still didn’t quite understand what was going on at this point. From what he could tell, this woman, though absolutely disgusting, somehow thought that because she was beautiful (this fact could not be denied) that men should have to put up with any disgusting thing she could dish out in order to be with her. “So, now zat you have earned even a glimpse of my true beauty, you will no doubt wish to court me, oui?”

Kyle’s eye twitched. What was it with him lately and disgusting chicks thinking he wanted to date them? Still, Alexia had taken finding him in the women’s locker room surprisingly well, and he didn’t want to tick her off… ‘Best to let her down easy. “Well, Alexia, I would love to… I mean you are absolutely beautiful, but unfortunately I don’t think my girlfriend would appreciate that.”

“I see, you are already spoken for? …” Alexia’s face became crestfallen, but only for a moment as happy realization washed over it. “But you still could not resist me, oui? So zis just means zat I must convince you to leave zis woman for moi! I shall not stop until you realize how much you are wasting yourself on her! Hahaha.”

Kyle grimaced, the feeling of dread he was getting a lot lately creeping up his spine with a vengeance. “Alexia, that’s not what I—“

Kyle was unable to finish his sentence as the locker room doors opened, more than a few women’s voices being heard as they entered and made their way towards Alexia and his location. Kyle nearly panicked again, but Alexia just smiled. “Haha, you need to get out of here unseen, no? I can help you hide while you wait for ze ‘all clear’, if you are willing to help me, of course.”

Kyle definitely didn’t like the direction this was going, but had no choice other than jumping back into Alexia’s locker. A nod of dejected acceptance set Alexia smiling and laughing, grabbing what looked like a sort of business outfit from her nearby gym bag before tossing the bag into her locker and grabbing his hand. “Zis will also give me some time to… entice you, no? Haha.”

Kyle startled as Alexia squeezed his arm to her side, making sure to turn his palm a press it to her completely drenched side boob before dragging him off into the shower area, pulling Kyle along with her into a reserved member’s only shower stall…

1151.content:
Kyle was more than slightly apprehensive as Alexia dragged him into the private shower stall. As she pulled him inside behind her, he couldn’t help but think the semi-small space was most likely not made for two people. Slightly smaller than a handicap bathroom stall, Alexia’s BO stench quickly chased out any fresh air. Trying not to gag, Kyle was suddenly struck by how attractive this girl was in spite of himself. If he wasn’t already “dating” Jessi, and of course if Alexia wasn’t giving her a run for her money on the grossness scale, Kyle would have at least made a pass at her.

By the time his eyes wandered back up to Alexia’s, he was faced with a very large smirk. “Do you like what you see? Zere is much more where zis comes from, you know. Hahaha. You will wait for moi to take a shower, oui?” Kyle is about to object but is left speechless and in awe as Alexia hands him her change of clothes and proceeds to yank her sports bra off with a lot of jostling, wiggling and jiggling, before her breasts explode with sudden freedom like two gigantic bowling balls, so perky they might as well be filled with helium. Of course, this isn’t lost on Alexia, who, after tossing her bra onto Kyle’s head with her continuously growing smirk, proceeds to turn around and start wiggling her ass out of her tiny lace panties.

Kyle once again received a good taste of Alexia’s sweat before the bra shifted off of his face and ended up as a necklace. A very sweaty, smelly necklace. With her ass halfway out of the tiny panties, Kyle finally snapped out of his stupor, not wanting this to get any more out of hand. Of course he didn’t mind what he was seeing… But that thought was overruled by his “loyalty” to Jessi, and, more accurately, the horror of having yet another disgusting girl making advances on him. In a panic, he blurted out the first thing that came to mind to stop her, though as usual he wished he hadn’t a moment later. “NO! I mean, umm… You don’t need a show—er…”

Alexia blinked at him for a moment in surprise and confusion as Kyle fought the urge to try and grab the words out of the air, but the moment was much too short as a huge smile erupted on her face. “I can not believe I ever doubted you! To zink at first I zought you were just like all ozer men! Of course I don’t need to shower; I am beautiful even after a workout, even zough I am drenched from head to toe with ze sweat!”

Having spent a bit too much time with Jessi, Kyle braced for a very sweaty glomp, but it never came. Instead, Alexia’s trademark smirk re-emerged, her arms crossed under her ample bosom and purposefully squishing the orbs together and pushing them up right in front of him. “Still enjoying ze show, I see. But I am afraid zat if you want to get out of here, I must put on my suit, oui?”

Kyle couldn’t be happier. The her stink was definitely becoming overpowering at this point, and she really DID in fact badly need a shower, he had somehow avoided what had seemed inevitable moments ago. “Of course, you did promise to help me, no?”

That feeling of dread that was becoming a constant part of his life started creeping up his back again, though it was more than slightly muffled by the sight of Alexia giggling, sending her twosome jiggling and wiggling. “Umm… Yeah, what did you need me to do?”

“You shall assist me in dressing! It is a high honor, you know.”

Kyle sweatdropped. There were so many ways this could go wrong. But it wasn’t like he had another way to get out of, by the sounds of it, the increasingly populated locker room, and it wasn’t like he wouldn’t enjoy it at all… “Alright… How do you want me to help?”

“You will put everything on me, of course.” This seemed like completely dressing her instead of assisting, but again he wasn’t in a position to complain too much as Alexia tapped her foot and shifted her hips impatiently, causing her breasts to jump, slap, and collide. Kyle barely caught himself before he was drooling once again as he set the pile of clothes on a nearby bench, so nervous he could barely acknowledge the sports bra still soaking his shirt around his neck or the sock festering on his shoulder, let alone take them off.

Kyle was about to ask her if she was okay, but he never got the chance to say it. One second, her almost completely exposed stomach was letting out another horribly strained gurgle, the next second, the next second, her face became VERY green, and finally, her mouth was open and she was tossing her cookies everywhere… or more to the point, all down the front of Kyle. As Kyle reeled, he ended up slipping on some of the puke, twisting and falling onto the floor, the impact probably being the only thing keeping him from losing his lunch as well. When the pain passed and he opened his eyes, Alexia at least seemed to be done.

I have what my father zays is my “worst habit”, especially when I am not feeling well… But I am sure zat you will zink the “view” is worth it, oui?”

SSSPPPPRRRAASSSSSHHHHHTTTT!!!

Kyle nearly hurled as he pulled his head of her cheeks with a sickening popping sound, but this didn’t last long as Alexia sat the rest of the way down on his face, her ass engulfing him again and burying him even deeper. SSSPPPLLLLOOOORRRRSSSHHHH!!! SSSSLLLLLLLRRRRSSSSHHHHH SSSSPPPPPPPRRRRAAASSSSHHHHTTTT PPPRRRROOOOOLLLLSSSHHHH!!!

Kyle was in yet another living hell as Alexia swiveled her hips all over his face, the sweat and ass grime smearing all over him the least of his problems as she released fart after fart, each wetter and more disgusting than the last, setting the bar again and again. “Mmm… PPOOOOOORRRTTPPPpreeeeeeeennnn… You are enjoying being zis close to my derriere, oui? I would not do zis for any other man, no one else understands how much my beauty is worth. Oooh…”

Alexia seemed to really be enjoying this as she practically ground Kyle’s face to a pulp, her farts still getting worse and worse every moment until the ride seemed to be slowing to a halt. PPPRRRAAAPPPTT!!! “Oooh… It seems ze ride is over Ky… We will have to continue zis some other time. I am sure you will not need much time to choose moi over that woman.” Kyle was finally given the chance for some “fresh” air as Alexia VERY slowly got up, seeming to take her time and enjoy the experience, clenching her cheeks to make sure his head came with her as far as it could before gravity finally won out and he flopped back onto the floor. SSSLLLLLRRRRSSSHHHHTTTTPRAPT!!!

Alexia leaned down again, moving her jugs to look at Kyle. “Zis was… very fun. And remember, a Rothswei is not afraid of anything. Hahaha. Do not worry about giving me your contact information, I already had my people send zem to me.” Kyle just tried to catch his breath as she walked forward enough so that he could sit up, her standing legs still on either side of his. Kyle just wanted to get out, get away, but in his dazed state, his chivalrous nature kicked in as the doors opened, Alexia seeming about to walk out with her panties still off and her skirt still hiked.

“Alexia, wait!”

Alexia smirked as she looked over her shoulder at him. “Oh? Did you not have enough? Hahaha. Of course not. You know my true beauty’s value, after all.” Sticking her butt into Kyle’s face once again, she wiggled it in front of him mesmerizingly until… PPLLOOOOOOOOROOOOORRRRRTTTSSSSHHHHHHSPLAAAATTT!!! PPPREEEEEEESSSSHHHHHHHAAARRRRPPPPTTTT!!!! BLLLLOOOOOOOORRRSSSSSHHHHHPPRRAAAAMMMPTTT!!!!

Kyle was blasted once again by horrendous gas, but this time it was accompanied by blasts upon blasts of shit. Alexia continued to jiggle her ass, brownish green sludge being flung all over Kyle’s face, chest, and the rest of her body. When the ride finally let him off, Kyle stormed out into the fresh air, throwing the now shit-stained panties at the attendant’s feet as he flew by. “Whooaa dude… I told you man, you gotta watch out for those red-heads, they can be into some freaky stuff!”

Kyle ignored the man (and the dozens of other disgusted stares and jeers) and made the long walk back to the apartment…

By the time he made it up the six flights of stairs (the elevator STILL out of order), Kyle’s own sweat mixing with the god awful mess on his shirt was waking up the horrendous smells all over again. Sighing, he walked to the apartment, glad at least that it would be clean, for now, anyway.

But when Kyle opened the door, he was in for a VERY rude awakening. Time stood still as the door swung open, atrociously disgusting air practically pushing him back. The room was completely trashed. Clothes were everywhere, the “dirty clothes bin” even having been emptied and the contents strewn about, and last, but certainly not least, Jessi’s VERY dirty, completely exposed ass was sticking up in the air right at him and jiggling from side to side, Jessi’s upper body sticking under the end of the bed, from what little Kyle could see.

“Oh, there you are KyKy! I’ve been waiting for, like, ever! Do you think you could help me? I’m kinda… well… I think I might be stuck. Hehehe.”

Kyle couldn’t even think at this point. He was so disgusted, so frustrated, so… trapped, that there was nothing he could do but help her. Unfortunately, in his stupor, when Kyle stepped forward, he missed the thick layer of liquid shit on the floor. In the blink of an eye, he was slipping and falling forward, until he had buried his face deep into Jessi’s shit-smeared ass crack, his face now filthy once again. “Aaawww, hehehe, I missed you too! And we can definitely snuggle, but I think we should, like, get me out of here first. Hehehe. And you’re making my butt tickle.” SSSPPPLLLLLOOOOORRRRRRSSSHHHHSSSPPPLLLAAAATTTT!!!

Kyle’s mind nearly shut down completely as his face was blasted with a splash of Jessi’s sludge that even managed to get onto his shirt, mixing into a revitalizing Alexia’s shit and puke. It’s funny how the mind works in situations like this, how it tries to escape, cling to anything except what was happening right then. Instead of thinking how he was trapped with Jessi, how even if he escaped he would be stuck with Alexia, or how he was covered in shit from both girls, all Kyle could think was; “How and why the hell is she stuck under the bed?”
