After eating the bagels and getting dressed, he found himself quickly getting shooed out of the apartment, almost insultingly so. "S-sorry, that was a LOT of fun, but umm... That went a little... Well I think I liked it a little TOO much, and you're a really nice guy, so... Well let's just keep this a one time thing, okay? No hard feelings? Hopefully your next girl is a little more your size, huh? Hehehe. It was fun though, but have a nice one!"

Kyle stood awkwardly as the door was practically shut in his face, a range of mixed emotions racing through his mind. Apparently he had not only survived the encounter with his blind date, but had even gotten away with never having to be near her again. He wanted to be happy, chock this all up to a horrendous experience and be done with it, but... For some reason he found himself having the crazy idea that... Just MAYBE him and Corra could work out. Against all better judgement, Kyle wrote a note on the back of a receipt he found in his pocket, "Here's my number, give me a call if you feel like having a 'little' fun sometime. Haha, sorry, couldn't resist. - Kyle", and with more than a little fear and just as much embarrassment, he quickly shoved it under the door before making the walk back to his place.
12411.title: Part 2

1242.content:
“Hey you!!!”

“Get back here!!!”

“Stop I say! STOP!!!”

Kyle ran as fast as his legs would carry him, weaving down this corridor, stumbling up a random set of stairs, anything to get away from no less than the royal guard... How did he get into this predicament, let alone into the castle? His morning flashed into his mind in fits and starts between twists and turns of the castle hallways...

Kyle was a lowly merchant’s son in the country of Tushini, ruled by the women of the Bombula family for gods knew how long. He had “inherited” the small rug shop from his father (see also, was forced to take over when his mother passed and his father took off somewhere). His father had never made much money, and Kyle, well... He made even less-so.

And so when the tax collectors came he found himself selling the shop to them to pay off his father’s debt, and was homeless at the ripe age of 20. With the despair of his situation not fully kicking in, he found himself aimlessly wandering through the capital, until when he finally noticed where he was, he felt very out of place.

He had wondered into the Queen’s district, a part of the town only the most successful merchants or highest appointed officials called home, let alone walked through like he was doing. Needless to say, he was getting more than a few withering stares as he walked through a part of town not meant for his eyes. Filled with awe that outweighed any embarrassment, he decided to continue exploring until he was undoubtedly shooed out. It’s not like I have a home to go back to anyway... He thought.

After seeing a suit of armor so shiny it hurt his eyes, a church so big his entire district could fit inside of it, and a private bath that must use more water in a day than he usually saw in a year, Kyle wasn’t sure if he should be inspired to work harder in life or despair in the fact that no matter how hard he tried he would never live here... So tangled in his thoughts, Kyle found himself wandering once again until he ran smack dab into the walls of none other than the castle itself.

The wall was so high he couldn’t even see the castle anymore beyond it, so wide he couldn’t see where it ended looking in either direction. With a sigh, he decided it should be time to find wherever he would be sleeping tonight... But something was itching at him. If the Queen’s District was this amazing... How spectacular must the castle be? If I have to go back... I’d like to see inside at least once... Knowing this would never be, he banged his fist against the wall, as if this would cause it to move... Until it suddenly did.

With the grinding of stone on stone, the portion of the wall he had hit moved away, slowly making room until it opened into a doorway to a set of stairs, leading down into some sort of tunnel. Everyone in Kyle’s district had heard rumors as kids that there were passages like these leading into the castle, but he never really thought he would ever find one... Ever instinct told him to flee, but... Can I really pass up an opportunity like this?

After only a moment’s more of hesitation and making sure he wasn’t see, Kyle quickly made his way inside, the door slowly closing behind him as he made his way down the stairs...


Kyle felt like an absolute idiot as he ran his hand along the tunnel wall. It had been great fun for a few moments—Until the door in the wall shut behind him, leaving him in complete and utter darkness. With the door unresponsive from this side, he pressed forward, but soon he wasn’t even sure this seemingly endless set of tunnels led to the castle. He was beginning to think he would be trapped down here forever when he turned a corner and slammed into a wall. After all that, a dead end?! Nearly fully in despair for the second time today, he almost didn’t recognize the stone on stone grating sound from before until another doorway had completely materialized in front of him once more.

Nearly laughing with glee, Kyle stepped through the doorway without a moment’s hesitation, glad to be out of that deathtrap. To his relief, whatever corridor he had been let out into was currently deserted. He could barely believe his eyes as he followed the hallway, the rugs he was walking on being more ornate than anything his father could get a hold of. Drapes worth more than his entire district adorned the walls, and when he eventually found a window up a small set of stairs, he was left speechless at the view onto the city. He had really made it into the castle!!! Jumping for joy, he couldn’t help but run down the corridor, to excited to explore the rest of the castle to really think about anything else... Like running smack dab into a pair of royal guards around the corner...

Now he had what felt like a whole garrison of them on his tail as he careened through the castle. In desperation for a place to hide, he decided to duck through the next door he came across. Bursting in a shutting the door behind himself, he took in the room around him and tried to catch his breath... Only to cough on a vile stench. He appeared to be in a very ornate bedroom, a very large bed with expensive linens all over it signifying the person was important but... the smell of BO and things that Kyle didn’t want to think about pointing more to someone of VERY common birth.

Hearing the guards clanging around outside looking for him, Kyle decided he didn’t have much time to complain and took the only action he could think of... Hiding under the covers. Quickly moving forward through the fetid air, he yanked the multitude of blankets aside-- To find a very disheveled woman in nothing but a very sheer nightgown.

He only had a moment to notice this before he was assaulted with a stench 20 times worse than the rest of the room, now unmistakably overpowering with the smell of a very dirty ass. So busy with fighting the urge to vomit, he barely was able to put a hand to her mouth before she screamed, hoping against hope he could convince her not to let the guards know he was there...


Agatha dreamed happily in blissful sleep, dreaming of her perfect prince. Almost a year had passed now since she had found out she would soon be Queen, and the now 19 year old had grown to meet the challenge, in more ways than one. Her already bulbous and non-proportionate hips were now well on their way to rivaling the Queen’s, and she had even put on a bit of pudge in the middle now, her breasts going up a size or two to follow suit. She had become much more self-dependent since the days before she was introduced to just how... Overpowering her mother’s butt could be, and this had led to a more mature version of herself. She relied on the servants much less, and took her position as princess much less for granted.

However, this self-reliance also led to a certain aspect of her only deepening... She loved her own stench (or “mark” as she called it). Although she was still appalled at what her mother could accomplish with her bum, she couldn’t help loving every bit of what her own body could produce. A favorite part of every night had become burying herself under as many covers as possible in order to keep everything in her own personal dutch oven. From the stench of her continuous sweat, the cheesy smell of feet, and especially the continuous bellowing of her butt, everything was trapped inside, and nothing was more of a turn-on—Well, except for one thing.

A thought had slowly taken root in her mind since her servant-turned-“mentor” Priscilla’s son had helped her get dressed last year. Sure, it was amazing to be able to enjoy the stench her body could produce, but... Wouldn’t it be even moreso to be able to share it with someone? Even she had to admit that her smells were very near reaching her mother’s levels of atrocity, so she would settle for anyone who would even just put up with the smell to be around her. And maybe... Just maybe... Over time... They could learn to like it too? The very thought of this made her even more turned on (a mean feat at this point), but it had caused it’s own problems.

Her mother was more than happy in her progress towards her being a proper queen, but when it came to finding a suitor... Whenever one showed, she couldn’t help but give them a little test or two. It... Never ended well. Once she had refused to bathe, and the poor guy couldn’t even stand next to her. Another time she actually farted, only once, and it was enough to send the suitor and his entire entourage running for the hills.

Grumbling a bit in her sleep, she subconsciously steered her thoughts back towards her smells... When she suddenly felt very cold as her covers were snatched away. At first she assumed it was Priscilla, but instead as her vision cleared she saw... a man. His plain looking clothes couldn’t look more out of place in the castle life she was used to, but he was tall, fairly muscular, a mess of brown hair adorned his head, and his sea green eyes were peering into her own—

Agatha shook herself out of her still turned on daze, opening her mouth to scream bloody murder about an intruder when the brute suddenly put his hand to her mouth...
1242.title: A Royal Pain in the Ass: Betrothal

12421.content:
Kyle was more than panicking at this point (not to mention ready to toss his breakfast all over the disheveled, smelly, raven-haired woman from her stench), but he didn’t have any other options if he wanted help at this point. “I’m sorry, I’m sorry. I know this is really strange, but I swear I’m not here to hurt you. I just was really down on my luck and wanted to see the castle, and now—“

Loud banging could be heard outside; they were starting to search the rooms for him!

“Please, I’m begging you, I just need a place to hide. I know I’m trespassing, but I swear I won’t do anything wrong. Will you help me?”

The disheveled woman stared back at him for a few moments that felt like hours, her green eyes diving into his.


Agatha was furious. This random peasant had the gall to barge into her bedchamber, pull her covers aside, and then ask her for help?! She had absolutely no reason to help someone like him, let alone hide him from the guards, but... Despite everything, something was giving her pause. She didn’t feel in danger at all. In fact, the way his hand was gentle touching her lips like this was kind of nice-- Angrily shaking her head to move his hand and stop yet another turn-on induced daydream, she made a show of rolling her eyes before conceding.

“F-fine, but... No funny business... Lay down, quickly.”


Too thankful to complain about the smell, and frankly too panicked to really think about it much anymore, Kyle quickly laid down on the bed as his savior scooted up into a sitting position against the elaborately decorated headboard. It wasn’t until he was laid down that he realized she had spread her legs to accommodate him, a fact they realized in unison as her milky white skin went deep pink with embarrassment.

“I said no funny business!”

Kyle could only grunt in response as his head was soon buried between and underneath a pair of massive thighs, the sweaty flesh smothering him even more as she pulled her blankets back up to cover him/her lap.

Although he had been able to deal with it through panic-induced adrenaline, Kyle was suddenly very much reminded of his savior’s stench as she fidgeted and shifted above him, every twitch seeming to raise the temperature in his hiding spot, smear her obviously unwashed thigh meat on his face, and make her produce more and more sweat (not to mention smell). It was all he could do to get a breath in now and then, but each time he choked on the fetid air he was trapped with he wished he hadn’t.


Agatha wasn’t exactly sure she had made the right choice in helping this peasant, but if the tingling sensation she was feeling running up her spine every time she twitched or he breathed against her thighs had any say, her body definitely thought it was. Her whole body was flush, and it was all she could do to force herself to answer when the guards came to her door and began to pound.

“Princess Agatha! Our apologies your Highness, but there appears to be a rogue on the loose in the castle! We must check your chambers to make sure you’re safe!”

“I-I’m quite alright! I don’t—Stop moving! – I think I would know if he was here!”

“Your Highness, we must make sure you’re safe!”

“F-fine...”

Agatha felt lightheaded as the guards burst in and began searching the corners and wardrobes in her room. She couldn’t take the feeling of his face under her legs, let alone his breath... With a flurry of panic as the guards looked around, she brought her legs up and pushed the peasant down slightly with her feet, causing a strange bulge at the end of the bed and a moan from the man beneath the blankets. Sure the guards would hear him, she did the only thing she could think of; covering his face with her feet to keep him quiet.


Kyle was miserable as her heard murmurs through the blankets and this woman’s leg flab, none of which he could make out. As if the smell and smothering fat wasn’t bad enough, every time he took a breath he not only nearly got sick, but also caused her to twitch and shift above him. This not only smothered him more in a seemingly never-ending cycle, but each movement only seemed to raise the temperature AND the sweat/stench level.

When her thighs suddenly lifted off of him, he was both relieved to be done with the smothering and horrified she was revealing him to the guards. Instead, she seemed to want him to scoot down, and when he didn’t move fast enough, she pushed him down with on her own. “Ouch, that hurt—mmrpph!!”

Kyle could only cringe in silent agony as something even worse than the woman’s thighs smothered his face now... Her cheesy, sweaty, very unwashed feet. As if this wasn’t bad enough, she continued to use his face as some sort of massaging stone, rubbing it all over with her raunchy feet, even forcing them into his mouth from time to time...


Although this had the desired result of shushing him, it made Agatha no less nervous. She couldn’t stop moving her feet, and the ticklish feeling she was getting from all this was becoming so unbearable she was beet red from keeping herself laughing. She felt like she was sweating waterfalls now (she was), and she was so embarrassed she felt faint. All this combined meant she didn’t notice the guards start to stare until they all were.

“We—Umm... We’re sorry to have... I-interrupted you, Your Highness... W-we’ll be on our way...”

In a near panic, the guards all but evacuated the room, leaving a very bewildered but relieved Agatha.

Wait... Did they think I was... Oh Goddess!


Kyle was nearly unconscious when the covers finally lifted up and the woman removed her feet from his face. He was so relieved to have semi-fresh air, he almost forgot what he should really be thankful for; the guards appeared to have left.

After catching his breath for a second, Kyle sat up to look at his savior, who somehow appeared more sweaty and red than he remembered. Although her stench still hung around the room, and she had practically tortured him, he couldn’t help but be thankful. She had helped him after all.

As they sat looking at each other, Kyle finally had time to notice she was only in her nightgown and this woman was... Well... Pretty well endowed. The blue nightgown she wore didn’t leave much to the imagination, her breasts fitting into it very snuggly, with (to his embarrassment) very erect nipples. Her torso had a bit of pudge to it, her belly button noticeable through the fabric along with a pair of love handles. His eyes traveled lower to view her hips and the thighs that had been smothering him, but she had already covered her lower half again with the covers.

Thinking that was probably for the best, and before she could catch him ogling, Kyle decided to thank her while he could. “I-I’m... I’m really sorry to make you do that. But I really appreciate it. I’ll umm... I’ll get out of your room now. If umm... If I ever can, I’ll return the favor. My name’s Kyle... Can I know your name, in case we meet again?”
12421.title: Part 2

124211.content:
Agatha could only blink in response for a few moments. She wasn’t sure which was more astonishing, the fact that she had just subjected him to smothering by both thighs and sweaty feet and he was still thanking her, or the fact that he appeared to not know she was the princess. She actually opened her mouth to inform him, but quickly changed her mind. What if it got out?! Testing a suitor a little is one thing, but no one can know that their princess can be this much of a slob! “I-it’s... It’s Aggie. Just Aggie.”

For some reason Kyle thought that name sounded familiar somehow, but he quickly brushed it off. “Well, thank you Aggie. I’ll try to get out of here on my own now... Hopefully we meet again in better circumstances...” Knowing full well he would probably never meet someone from the castle again after all this, Kyle quickly made his exit, turning the opposite way he thought the guards had went, looking for any kind of way out.


Agatha spent the rest of the morning in a daze. Although a part of her felt guilty for helping Kyle (after all he could have been a thief for all she knew), she was actually really happy with herself. Of course, it helped that he was the first male to be around her true self without vomiting everywhere or passing out, but she tried not to think about that. After all, he was gone now anyway. Still... The smell in her room released from under her blankets was even getting to her, but he had still thanked her for helping him as if it had been nothing at all...

Trying to take her mind off it all, she instead decided to ring for breakfast. Eggs and ham and heavily buttered bread would do nicely, and the more the better. By the time her 3rd or 4th serving of it all came around, she had almost forgotten about Kyle... Almost.

Her thoughts were interrupted as Priscilla entered her bedchamber at just after noon, only to put her hand to her face almost immediately. “Oh my... Why have you not bathed yet? You smell even worse than usual this morning!”

Agatha opened her mouth to respond, but realized she couldn’t tell Priscilla about Kyle. “Sorry, I umm... I slept in this morning.”

Priscilla wanted to be mad, especially when looking at all the platters the princess had obviously been munching off of, but was a bit taken aback by the princess actually apologizing to her. Maybe she really will be ready soon... Doing her best to not breathe in the stench that filled the room, she made her way over to one of the wardrobes, pulling out a deep purple and black dress made of some very heavy material. “I can assume you’ve forgotten the ball is today then? Well we won’t have time to bathe you now. I can help you do up your hair, but you’ll have to wear this. We can put oils on the parts of you that show, and this material will keep in the rest of the stench under the dress. Even dampen the sound of your... emissions to some degree.”

Agatha again opened her mouth to let out a scathing remark, but after noticing the empty trays around her decided that Priscilla was most likely right...


Some time later, Agatha sauntered through the halls in what appeared to be a very largely hooped dress. No one would know that this morning she hadn’t bathed, or that she was anything but the perfect princess. Her hair was twisted and twirled up perfectly, and she smelled faintly of lilacs and roses.

She usually was annoyed by balls now, especially with all of the suitors that had no idea how “unprincesslike” she could be flocking to her side, but she was somewhat glad for the distraction today. She could just go out there, do a few hours of dancing, and completely forget about-- “Kyle?!”

Kyle nearly jumped out of his skin as Agatha called out to him. He had been fairly lucky in eluding the guards up until now, but whenever he was close to getting out, he was stopped by more people coming in for the ball. He had just stopped to look around the corner of a hallway, too busy watching some guards at the other end to notice Agatha walk up behind him. At first he was just relieved it wasn’t a guard, but for a second he didn’t recognize the person speaking to him either, until... “Aggie? You look... Well you look amazing.”

Agatha was happy to receive the praise, even about to beam before she realized the situation they were in. “What are you doing here? I thought you were leaving?”

“I was, but... I couldn’t get out. Umm... I hate to ask, but...”

“You want me to help you again?” Agatha put her hands on her hips, sighing in frustration. “I don’t know how I would at this point... I need to be making my entrance.”

Kyle realized he didn’t know how she’d help either. His eyes wondered as he tried to think of something, anything she could do... And then his eyes rested on her dress. He had heard about, even seen a few hoop dresses before, but this one was ridiculous. It flared out so wide and deep behind her he thought it might actually get in the way of her walking. But when he thought about it... That meant...

“Umm... You could... Let me... Hideunderyourdress.”

Agatha blinked at Kyle, hardly able to catch what he said with how quickly he had said it. “You want to... Hide under my dress?”

“I know, I know, but... It’s a hoop dress, right?”

“Well... Yes, but—“

“So that means there should be a lot of room under there, right?”

“W-well, usually, however—“

“Please, Aggie! I’ll make sure no one knows I’m there. Whenever you get the chance, just walk outside, and I’ll make my exit! You’ll never have to see me again!”

Agatha was appalled. Did this commoner know no bounds? How could he ask such a thing of a woman, let alone the princess?! But... A thought was tickling at the back of her mind. No one would ever have to know... And Kyle didn’t know she was a princess, after all... And... It might be... a little enjoyable.

Fighting herself from letting a blush form on her face, Agatha took a deep breath, and forced herself to nod in approval. With a few moments of hesitation, she hitched up her dress just a bit, and before she knew it Kyle had dove underneath it. Feeling his hands on her legs sent lightning bolts up her spine, and it was all she could do to keep from falling back on top of him. Not wanting to get cold feet now, she forced herself to start moving forward. Although it was slightly awkward at first, they eventually were able to move together, until no one would notice...


Kyle was immediately assaulted by a now somewhat familiar stench, quickly informing him that Agatha hadn’t cleaned up much before getting dressed. On top of that, her dress was apparently of some really heavy material, because it was like being under the covers with her all over again. Almost losing his balance from the smell alone, he was forced to put his hands on her legs... and was forced to realize how big they really were. Her slightly above average calves exploded into small tree trunks, the fat that had smothered his face earlier jiggling and rubbing together with abandon.

With all this going on, he almost didn’t realize that he didn’t have anywhere near as much room as he thought he would... He was suddenly aware of the Bombula family secret, this was no hoop dress. Agatha’s ass filled so much of the dress there was hardly any room for him to fit at all, crouched or otherwise. As if this wasn’t enough, Agatha wasn’t... exactly... wearing any undergarments.


“Your Highness, the Crown Princess of Tushini, Agatha Bombula!”

Agatha realized this mistake as well a moment too late as she was announced to the room, unable to turn back now. She instantly felt her body shoot up 10 degrees, a fact that was punctuated by the near-instant onset of what could only be swamp ass. As she walked into the room and waved to everyone, she was very glad for Priscilla’s choice in wardrobe. At least no one will be able to smell it... Well, no one else anyway...

Agatha proceeded forward into the crowd, making sure to make polite conversation with a few random dignitaries before making her way over to stand next to her mother.


Kyle nearly forgot to keep up with Agatha’s movements as he heard her being announced. Aggie was that Agatha? He was under the dress of the Crown Princess?!?! He was so dead. For now though, all he could do was his best not to trip Agatha up, although that was becoming difficult. The smell was worse than the bedroom already, and the grinding and clapping of her cheeks just above his head was more than a bit distracting (not to mention fighting the constant urge to look up and stare at it). As if all of that wasn’t enough, his “sky” suddenly started raining down on him, leaving him with nothing to do but cringe and enjoy his skin crawling as Agatha literally watered him with her butt sweat.


Agatha had hoped that she would be able to make a short trip outside, but the dancing started too soon. Forced to dance or insult her guests, she forced herself to waltz with a few suitors. She had been more than a bit worried at first, but Kyle seemed to be able to move along with her well enough, and she soon felt like he almost wasn’t there... Except for the constant presence of his hands on her thighs...

Soon she had almost gotten used to this sensation as well, focusing on dancing more than Kyle. Suddenly, she felt a twist of pain in her gut, a violent gurgling sound barely audible to her above the music. Her breakfast/lunch had caught up to her, and from the feel/sound of it was very cross with her. In the middle of the song, she couldn’t excuse herself even to the side of the room, but her stomach would not be denied. Hoping against hope that Priscilla was right, Agatha gave a slight push... And only heard the smallest of reverberations, not audible to her dance partner over the music.
124211.title: Part 3

1242111.content:
Kyle felt like he had literally bathed in Agatha’s butt sweat at this point, her chubby thighs so slick with sweat and body grease that he could barely hold on. He was thinking she would make an exit as soon as possible, but instead he started to hear faint music... And then the dancing started.

He was suddenly glad one of his childhood friends had a mother that taught him how to dance, because he would otherwise have fell flat on his face after the first few steps. The temperature and smell around him somehow just kept getting worse, but the fear of what would happen if he was caught, not only for himself but for Agatha, gave him resolve enough to see it through... And then he heard gurgling.

At first he convinced himself she must just be hungry, but the louder the gurgling became, the more he realized it wasn’t coming from her stomach. Convincing himself he had nothing to worry about, Kyle focused himself back on the dancing... Only for Agatha’s thighs to tense up under his fingers for a moment and-- PPPHHHRRRAAASSSHHHTTTT!!!

Kyle was blasted with a hot surge of air and sweat from the deepest parts of Agatha’s ass from above, and suddenly the smell of her thighs and feet from the bedroom were like roses compared to this new stench. For the first time the thought of just giving himself up truly came into play, sheer force of will the only thing keeping him from doing nothing more than causing Agatha a few misteps in her dancing.


Agatha could only blush in shame as she realized what she had done to poor Kyle as she stumbled a bit in her dancing. Regardless of the fact that she couldn’t smell a thing, she knew it had to be atrocious for him under there. She fully expected him to give himself up now... Or at least pass out. But... Neither happened. Instead, after only a few stumblings caused no doubt by Kyle’s reaction to the sudden fart, she was once again able to dance freely.

Agatha was... Thouroughly impressed. This lowly commoner had withstood something at point blank range that had sent an entire suitor party running for the hills. Not to mention, he could very easily lift up her dress and escape. In the confusion her stench would cause he could easily get away... Maybe there was hope for her being able to share this side of herself with someone after all... Sitting with Kyle while she-- bllllrrpttt...

Another fart ripped its way out of her ass in surprise. How could she be thinking like that? She was a princess; she would find a legitimate suitor who could appreciate her... “other” side... But... Who knew how long that would take? When would the next time bet that she got to do something like this?

She had a moment or two more of hesitation, but soon her stomach decided for her with another angry gurgle. When the dancing is done or he can’t take anymore I’ll make sure he gets out from under there... But for now...


Kyle was dry heaving slightly as the stench took its toll, but was otherwise able to push through. Although he was appalled Agatha, let alone any princess, could do something like that to him, he was sure it was accidental.

BBBBRRRPPPPPFFFTTT!!!

And then he was less sure.

This fart was even more dank than the last, the smell of rotten eggs and spoiled meat mixing with the most ripe ass sweat to make a cocktail of vile stench.

After coming this far, Kyle continued to do his best to keep up with Agatha’s movements, but any confidence he had in her that she wasn’t doing this on purpose was shattered when after another slight pause, she began an absolute onslaught. PPLLLOOOORRSSHHHT PPRRAAAMMMPPFFFF BLLLRRRRRPPPTTT SPLORTSPRAP! Preeeenf... BLLOOORTT!!!


Agatha was having the time of her life. Never had she had so much fun at a ball, nor had she ever been so turned on. It was all she could do to not touch herself in front of all these people. She started to make it a habit to suddenly stop for a moment right before she farted, causing Kyle to bury his head and face against her bum when she let them rip. She was enjoying her time with Kyle so much that people were starting to give her weird looks, especially with how sluggish he was becoming at following her movements.

With a reluctant yet euphoric sigh, Agatha took a moment between songs to take a breath, moving back into a nearby hallway for a moment. “K-Kyle... I’m umm... I’m sorry about all that... I know it must have been rough... Just umm... I can’t go outside right now, but no one should come in this hallway for a while so... Catch your breath and I’ll come back for you. Promi-- Wait... PPPHHHHARRRRSSHHH!!! Okay, now promise. Hehe.”

Kyle couldn’t even respond as he literally fell out from under Agatha’s dress, a small cloud of stink wafting up from him as he lay on the ground. “Oh goddess... That’s horrible smelling... S-sorry, again... I’ll umm... I’ll be back, just umm... find a place to hide, alright?”

Agatha happily strode back into the dancing hall, feeling the most alive she had since she realized she had a thing for her own stink.

Kyle, on the other hand, felt worse than he had this morning when he found out he was homeless. With what little strength he had left, he dragged himself to a nearby bench which doubled as a storage compartment, lifted up the lid, and crawled inside. In a moment he was out like a light, glad to be away from Agatha and her lethal emissions.


Hours later, Agatha returned to the hallway. She had enjoyed the rest of the ball immensely, continuing to fart with no one else the wiser, even allowing just a bit of the stink out by lifting her dress a touch to scare away suitors every now and again. She had almost forgotten about Kyle as she was desperate to go to the loo, but realized she needed to get him out of the castle as she had promised first.

Unfortunately, Kyle was nowhere to be found. She looked down the length of the hallway, in all the rooms, even into one of the potted plants. She called his name a few times as well. She had decided to look one more time, when suddenly the nervousness of thinking Kyle had been captured and her unfinished business caught up with her.

Agatha was suddenly doubled over in pain. She needed to go. Now.

With a wild look of desperation, she saw a nearby bench, and luckily remembered it had storage underneath. Knowing she wouldn’t make it any farther than this, and hoping nothing valuable was in the storage compartment, she quickly hiked up her dress (allowing just about the most vile smell she had ever produced out into the world), lifted up the lid, aimed, and let fly...

Kyle had just enough time to wake up at the sudden light invading his hiding spot, before his vision was filled with a giant butt. He opened his mouth to scream, but was drowned out (both figuratively and literally) as Agatha’s butt blasted him with much more than a fart. SSPPLLLUUURRSSSHHH PPPRRAAASSSHHHTTT PPLLOOOORRRMMMFFFTTT PREEEEffftttt SPLART SPLAT!

Kyle could only cry as he was blasted with yet another worse-smelling concoction of Agatha’s. Chunky and gooey logs and splatterings of soupy muck rained down on him with no signs of stopping, the space in the storage quickly filling up with Agatha’s filth. Her boisterous bowel movement echoed up and down the hall, and soon it had attracted the attention of a few guards.

Oblivious, Agatha let out a contented sigh, standing up with one more SSPPRAAAFFTT!!! Her ass was steaming with filth as she put the dress down over it. She stepped away and turned to view her handiwork, mildly impressed.

She was more impressed when the bench suddenly gave way as the guards arrived just in time to see the pile of shit pour out of it... Along with a very unfortunate man named Kyle. Agatha could only stare in shock as Kyle coughed on what she had unknowingly buried him in, the guards more than a bit disgusted/confused until one finally spoke up.

“It’s the intruder! We found him!”

The guards quickly moved between Agatha and this “dangerous man”, their swords pointed at the wretched creature as he tried to stand up. “It’s lucky he didn’t attack you, Your Highness! Don’t worry; it’ll be off with his head for trespassing. Mandatory sentence by law! You won’t have to ever see him again!”

Kyle wasn’t absolutely sure that was such a bad thing now, but Agatha was in a panic. The shock of what she had done wearing off slightly, she couldn’t help but realize how much she enjoyed the thought of knowing Kyle was here with her during her massive dump... How much she didn’t want to not see Kyle... In fact, she was sure that she wanted to see him all the time... She didn’t want him to leave anymore, and she definitely couldn’t let him be executed! Then again... There was a way to get both...

Without a moment of hesitation, she stepped in front of the guards. “You can’t arrest this man, he’s not trespassing.”

“I-I beg your pardon, Your Highness, but... Then who is he?”

“He is my betrothed... And you will treat him with respect.”
1242111.title: Part 4

12421111.content:
The next few weeks were a blur of love and bliss for Agatha, and a trudge through torture for Kyle. Although he was still thankful for Agatha saving him, the feeling was growing more dim every day. Now that she was betrothed to him (the wedding weeks off awaiting his training for being part of royalty), she was constantly with him, and she went out of her way to be able to let herself go around him.

She only bathed when Priscilla would make her, she wouldn’t sleep unless he was in her dutch oven with her, and she insisted on always burping or farting directly in his face. She even refused to use the loo without him being with her, although he was glad at least he hadn’t had to be under her again...

Unfortunately, tonight he was in a bit of a predicament. In the middle of yet another night “snuggling” with Agatha (it had taken him nearly an hour to undo himself from her grasp without waking her), he had snuck out to get a bit of piece and quiet. Trying to find a place to hide out, he had gotten a bit turned around in the castle. Finding a door off the study, he had realized he found a room with a wooden outhouse-like toilet. Thinking he could shut himself in alone for a few moments at least, he sat down on the seat... only to realize the hole was much too big for someone his size a moment too late.

He had valiantly fought the inevitable, but his strength eventually gave out and he fell in. Sickened, he was nonetheless sure he could get out after a rest. Unfortunately, this was all the time needed for disaster to strike.

Kyle looked up in horror as he heard the door open, followed by Agatha’s face as she looked down. “K-Kyle? Is that you? What are you...?”

“Yeah, it’s me! I umm... I fell in, so...”

“W-wait... Did you know I go to this bathroom every night? I mean, ever since my butt started to fit it? I know you’ve come with me every time I go to the bathroom, but I felt bad waking you up this late... Is this your way of saying you really want to be there with me... Even if it’s under me?”

“W-what? Aggie, that’s—“

“—The sweetest thing anyone’s ever done! Don’t worry, I’ll make sure you never miss a thing from now on! Speaking of...”

Kyle tried to reason with her, tried to convince her otherwise, but instead was presented with a butt he was becoming all too familiar with. PPPLLLLAAARSSSHHHTTT SSSPPPPRRRROOOOOMMMFFFTTTT PPREEEENNNSSSHHHTTT!!! Kyle was once again pelted by Agatha’s ass as it unloaded all over him, easily coating him with filth and then some by the time she was done.

He could only look up in disgust as she stood up, pulling her nightgown over her butt without even attempting to wipe. “Don’t worry, I don’t mind if you enjoy yourself down there for a while... Just know this butt is ready for you when you come back to bed...”

Kyle began to seriously consider taking the death penalty, glad that at least this was over for tonight when he heard the door open again. Had Agatha come back?

Kyle couldn’t even say a word as the face that came into view this time was none other than the Queen! “Oh, Kyle... What are you doing down there? Oooooh, I understand, you little devil! Don’t worry, I know you two have your own idea of fun... But even my Dear Robert would never have gotten into the toilet for me... I’d like to give it a try... You won’t mind, right? We’ll keep this our little secret!”

Kyle again tried to protest, but it seemed like he had no say in the matter as an even bigger butt than Agatha’s completely consumed the seat above him, and if the horrible gurgling sound had anything to say about it, it was going to be there quite a while. SSSPPPPPPLLLLLRRRRRRSSSSHHHTTT!!!
12421111.title: Part 5

choices: Best Date Never: A Sisters Story
1243.title: More

12431.content:
Dillian sat alone in a booth, for the umpteenth time reconsidering his current dating situation, if it could even be called that. For what seemed like forever now, poor Dillian was trapped in a never-ending dilemma. Stay with his “girlfriend” Mila, and be constantly berated to death figuratively by both her AND her sister Mel’s ass (the former at least MOSTLY apologetically/accidentally, the latter very much on purpose), or break up with her and very likely end up LITTERALLY berated to death by her sister’s ass.

To only make matters worse, despite everything, he had begun to truly have feelings for Mila over time. Couple this with Mel’s constant indirect threats of death meant that Dillian stayed in his current situation, and had no end of his torture in sight.

Shaking his head to attempt to get his mind out of this slump, Dillian tried to convince himself that today would be different. Mila had PROMISED him that it would be just the two of them today. Although he couldn’t help dreading what would happen when Mel found out, he thought it would be worth it if he could further his relationship with Mila without Mel’s interference. ‘Who knows, I might even actually enjoy my time with Mila...’

And so here Dillian sat, waiting for his wayward girlfriend to arrive at “’Bacon’ Jim’s Burger Shack”. He was actually beginning to think she wasn’t showing and he might get an evening to himself when Mila suddenly burst through the doors. Within moments she had made eye contact and was sauntering over, Mel for once nowhere to be seen.

Dillian could barely keep himself from drooling as he watched her approach. The buxom brunette’s breasts were mashed into an ill-fitting sports bra, her midriff out for the world to see above a pair of just bigger than tiny workout shorts. She was a bombshell, picture perfect even... At least until he started noticing a few... flaws as she got closer. She was literally glistening with sweat. Her formerly white sports bra was already leaving little to the imagination, but the fact that it was stained almost yellow AND soaked through with sweat only brought on more attention. Her purple workout shorts were slung low on her hips, barely keeping her decent in the front, her jiggling thighs slapping and jiggling together with every step.

And then there was the smell. It got to him before she did, a stench that told him she not only hadn’t showered after a recent workout once again, but also probably hadn’t washed in the last few days. As if to add insult to injury, she dropped a gym bag next to Dillian before sitting down across from him. As he looked at the unzipped object, he could only recoil as he saw literal stink lines coming from inside, the wet slap of it hitting the seat of the booth no doubt from countless overworked gym attire that was literally spilling out of the poor bag. Dillian found himself more than happy they had been placed in a secluded far corner booth of the restaurant.

“Heya Dill! ‘Hope you haven’t been waiting too long! I had to give Mel the slip! I told her I was going to the gym, but I knew she wouldn’t believe me unless I went there... So while I was there I had a really good workout! Don’t worry though, I haven’t showered for a few days, so even MEL didn’t want to come with me, let alone follow me here afterwards! Oh, and I got to finally empty out my gym locker! I always end up leaving clothes there after I change... I haven’t ever brought any of it home to wash!”

This information did nothing to help Dillian’s nose, which was being simultaneously attacked by Mila’s “fresh” stench across from him along with the horrendously fermented stench right beside him. “Anyway, I’m glad I have a boyfriend who doesn’t mind a stink every now and again!”

Dillian could only roll his eyes at this, doing his best not to cough on the BO around him and enjoy his first real date with Mila since being forced to be her boyfriend. After a few moments of talking, he even was able to get relatively used to it (no doubt an ability hard-learned after what he had previously been through), when the waiter forced her way through the stink to ask them what they wanted to order.

“”I-I’ll just have a Jim’s Signature Bacon Burger... With fries and a water.”

“And you... Cough. Miss?”

“Ooooh I’ll have... 3—No, make that 4 Seven-Bean Chili Four-Cheese Burgers please! With a chocolate shake, of course!”

Dillian couldn’t believe his ears. The chili on those burgers would make the most iron of stomachs broil with gas, he didn’t even want to THINK what the cheese would do on top of it to Mila’s lactose intolerance on top of that, let alone the milkshake! “M-Mila... Do you... Do you really think that’s such a good idea?”

Mila looked at Dillian in complete bewilderment for a few moments, before her face broke out in a beaming smile. “Oh! I guess I SHOULD get something healthy too even though I was just at the gym, huh? You’re sooo sweet to look out for me Dill! I’ll have two side orders of the cheesy broccoli too! Hehe!”

Dillian could only smack his forehead in disbelief, the waiter quick to move away from the stench before he could protest. With Mila blissfully unaware of what all of these items would no doubt do to her digestive tract, Dillian eventually decided it was his duty as a boyfriend (and someone who would most likely have to spend the rest of the evening near her) to tell her. However, upon opening his mouth to say so, the smell around him suddenly increased once again, this time with the smile of overly ripe cheese mixed with especially raunchy sweat. He had a moment as he fought back a gag to wonder what this new horror was, until he suddenly felt something very wet slap itself (or more accurately themselves) into his lap.

Dillian’s eyes were back to watering like mad as he looked down to notice Mila had slipped her feet out of her gym shoes and had placed her sock-clad feet on his legs, a playful smirk from Mila signaling that this was apparently supposed to be sexy. She moved her feet in as sensual a fashion as she could muster on his legs and crotch, the smile only growing as the disgusted shivers running up his spine registered to her as sexual desire.

“Soooo, we’re finally on a date... Just the two of us... What ever should we do?”

As each squish and squelch of Mila’s toes and socks against his lap released a new burst of smelly feet, the last thing on Dillian’s mind was sexual endeavors. All he could think about was how to make it stop. “U-ummm... M-maybe since Mel’s always trying to separate us you c-could sit over here with me?”

Mila’s face immediately broke into a wide grin, and she was quickly moving to sit with him, taking her feet off his lap, putting her shoes back on, and soon grabbing the bag next to him and tossing it to the other side. Dillian was quite pleased with himself, having both stopped Mila from torturing him with her feet AND getting that disgusting bag away from himself... Until he realized that now there was nothing between him and the original SOURCE of both of these atrocities.

With a joyous smile, Mila plopped down next to him in the booth with a wet slap, a horrid squishing sound coming from her butt as the monstrous thing squeezed the air out of the seat cushions. She seemed content to just sit next to him to Dillian’s relief, until a light bulb seemed to go off over her head and she had a better idea. “I kind of like sitting on the inside of booths, you don’t mind, right Dilly?” Thinking this would give him an avenue of escape if nothing else, Dillian was quick to start standing up to exit the booth when Mila quickly pushed him back down. “Oh, don’t worry about getting out, I’ll just squeeeeeze past...” Dillian did not like where this was going, but before he could object, Mila had pushed him back as far as possible in the seat, and proceeded to take up every inch he left between himself and the table (and then some) with her own body, specifically her butt and hips.

Dillian could only groan as his lap was engulfed by yet another sweaty being, this time being Mila’s butt. As if to prove it was possible, his lap was immediately soaked through with even more sweat, and although he hoped it would be just as she passed, instead Mila decided to stop square center and wiggle and grind her hips into him instead. “Ooooops, I think I might be a little... Stuck... You don’t mind though, do you Dillian?” Dillian tried to let her know otherwise, but Mila soon silenced him as she tried to contort a bit and wrap her arm around his shoulders, which only ended up smothering his face against her side-boob and armpit more than anything, his pleading moans of elevating disgust only cementing the knowledge he must be enjoying all this. “Oh Dilly, this is sooo romantic. We’re going to have the absolute BEST date night ev—“

“WHAT IN THE HELL?!?!”

Dillian was happy as could be as Mila suddenly continued and moved to the inside of the booth, his breaths relatively fresh, that was until he realized what had startled Mila into suddenly moving off of him... Mel had found them.

“I THOUGHT you seemed too happy to be going to the gym, and here you are sneaking off with this loser!” Mel stomped her foot angrily, sending the seizure-inducing psychedelic design of the yoga pants she was wearing into a jiggling frenzy, her spaghetti strap cami above rolling up to show of a bit of her midriff as her breasts tried to escape their confines.

“I DID go to the gym, Mel! And it’s none of your business where I go!”

“That might be true, but I can’t trust a loser like this to be around you alone, who knows what he’ll try to do?!”

“Don’t talk about my BOYFRIEND like that!!!”
12431.title: Best Date Never: A Sisters Story

124311.content:
Dillian could only sit and unsuccessfully try to calm the two vixens down as they continued to shout over any of his protests until they seemed to notice people beginning to stare. “Well at least sit apart, he’s probably feeling you up and everything!” Suddenly Mel roughly grabbed his arm, attempting to wrench him out of the booth away from Mila. Instead of budging however, Mila had grabbed his other arm and kept him firmly in place.

“Maybe he would be if you’d mind your own business! And we just got comfortable, he’s not moving an inch!”

“Fine!” With a huff, Mel gave up on trying to pull Dillian out of the booth (Mila wrapping her sweaty arms around him in triumph) and instead decided to sit down... On the same side of the booth as them.

In an instant Dillian was squished between two somehow equally sweaty bodies (Mel’s no doubt from looking everywhere for her sister). The twisted and jostled on either side of him for more space in the booth, which really just meant they took up more and more of his space. By the time they were interrupted by Mila’s food arriving they were both practically sitting on equal portions of his lap.

“Sir, there was a slight mix-up with your order, it will be out shortly. Umm... Were you wanting to order anything miss?”

In response, Mel had already begun digging into one of Mila’s burgers angrily, dribbling splatters of chili and dribbling of cheese down her chin/front in the process as the waiter again slinked away.

“Hey, that’s my food!”

“It’s a toll for making me run around to find you!!!”

Dillian wanted to try and calm them down again, but he was too busy being sprayed with bits of partially chewed food and saliva as the two started eating as fast as they could while continuing to argue, completely oblivious to the shower that Dillian was receiving. As the two wolfed down the burgers and cheesy broccoli like they were in a competition, their slobby natures were laid bare; chili, burger grease, and cheese mixed together and plopped down onto their heaving chests, mixing again with sweat to somehow make their grimy bodies smell even worse as the same chests smeared and wobbled against either side of Dillian. As if to add insult to injury, the speed at which they were eating soon caused gas, and their continuous spraying of food onto poor Dillian was only paused for one or the other to let out a gigantic belch right into his face.

Dillian could only sit and hope for it all to stop, his skin crawling like mad, until the binge was suddenly ended as the food ran out, immediately punctuated by a gigantic gurgling from Mila’s stomach. GGGGGGRRRRRRRRMMMMMSSSHHH... “Oh god... Bathroom! Move guys!”

Startled by the literal roar that Mila’s stomach had just unleashed, Dillian tried to move out of the way to let her out... Only to be stopped by Mel’s lack of movement. He swore he saw a wicked smirk cross her face, before it suddenly changed to mock-distress. “Oof, soooorry Mila, but all that food made me really bloated... I think I’m stuck in the booth!” Mel made a point of sticking out her post-binge belly into the table to prove her point.

Dillian opened his mouth to call her bluff, but was quickly silenced with a PPPPRRRRRRFFFTTT!!! “I gotta go... NOW!” PPLLLOOORRFTTT!!!

The smirk returned to Mel’s face as she continued to fain being stuck, until suddenly Mila decided she couldn’t take it any more. Before either of the other two knew it, she was standing on the seat and trying to sidle past them, nearly stepping on Dillian’s crotch in the process of moving sideways. Dillian could only watch in awe as apparently her shorts had snagged as she tried to stand up on the seat and shifted down, leaving her ass completely exposed as it eclipsed his vision... And then suddenly blocked it out entirely as she lost her balance and sat back on his face.

PPPPRRRAAASSSHHHTTT!!! BBBRRRAAAFFFTTT!!!

Dillian could only flail in distress as Mel laughed uproarishly, Mila’s ass doing it’s best to devour his head until it really looked like she was just sitting on top of the booth. For Mila’s part, she was more than embarrassed, but this feeling was overshadowed by how... GOOD whatever Dillian was doing felt.

What Dillian was doing was screaming into the depths of the swampiest ass he could ever have imagined, one that periodically made it even worse as it blasted both horrible gas and sweat from even deeper recesses of his current prison all over his face. To Mila however it just felt like he was doing his best to make out with her butt... And it felt AMAZING. Before she knew it and in spite of everything around them, she found herself gyrating her hips down onto Dillian’s poor face, releasing her farts with reckless abandon. BLLLAAAPPTT PPLLOOORRFFTTT PPREEEENNNFFTTT!!!

Fortunately for Dillian there was only so much that their secluded location in the restaurant could mask, and when people started to look for the source of the horrible sounds they were hearing even Mel had to put an end to it. Suddenly “able” to get free, she moved aside and pulled Mila off of Dillian (no mean feat as Mila’s ass did its best to keep it’s suction hold before letting him go with a horrible squelch).

“Hey, don’t stop him! That felt really--- Ooooh... Sorry Dill, we’ll have to continue that later...”

Mila actually had a moment of wanting to protest, but suddenly realized the reason she had gotten into that position in the first place when her stomach let out another roar, sending her still exposed ass on a jiggling run to the bathrooms.

Dillian was left reeling, sucking down “fresh” air as fast as he could and trying to keep from hurling all over the table. His body fighting a losing battle with the latter, he tried to get up and run for the bathrooms as well, only to be stopped again by Mel. “Where do you think YOU’RE going? Running away AGAIN?”

Dillian nearly threw up into her lap in response, but the anger he felt for her right now was enough to keep himself together as he grumbled a response. “What the heck is your problem? We were doing just fine until you showed up! I know I was a jerk when we first met, but I really like her now!”

“Oh really? ALL of her?”

Dillian didn’t like the sound of what “all” implied, but he couldn’t back down now and let Mel win. “Yes, really! ALL of her!”

“Fine... Then I’ll give you a chance to prove it! Do what I say right now to prove you really like her! But if you back out, I swear to god I’ll take a dump down your throat myself!”

“Fine, name it!!!”

Sparks could practically be seen flying as Dillian and Mel glared at each other, the air around them so filled with aggressive energy that they didn’t even notice the waiter standing next to them again. “Umm... Your order’s ready, Sir... Sorry to, umm... Intrude.” The waiter practically ran from them this time, although the lingering smell from Mila’s recent explosions was reason enough not to stick around.

With a humph, Mel grasped for something to prove Dillian hadn’t really changed, her eyes flitting from his food around the room, then landing on... Mila’s gym bag. An evil smile slowly crept onto her face, sending a chill up Dillian’s spine as she stood up and started rummaging through it, reanimating its vile stench in the area once again.

As she rummaged through the bag, Dillian realized he had a chance to escape, to run and get out of this. But... Besides the fact that he didn’t want to lose to Mel (or put up with her probably very serious threat), the more Dillian thought about it... The more he realized he meant what he said. He really did like Mila now. Sure she could be a little... Okay, she was the grossest girl (besides Mel) he had ever met, but despite all that, especially for the short amounts of time they were alone, he really enjoyed it (at least when she wasn’t trying to show him how much she stunk). Gritting his teeth with resolve, he decided right then and there he would go through with this, whatever it was that Mel came up with, to prove how he felt.

This resolve was put to the test as Mel suddenly grabbed his water and chugged it, putting the empty glass on the table before pulling a horribly overused, padded sports bra. The material was literally soggy with sweat, a fact that was made even more apparent as Mel took the bra and squeezed it with a triumphant sneer, wringing out all the sweat... into his glass.

“Drink it.”
124311.title: Part 2

1243111.content:
Dillian was of course disgusted, and wanted to ask what the hell that proved, until he remembered who he was talking to. Of course she would come up with something like this. Convincing himself it was better than her threat of choking on her shit at the very least, Dillian grabbed the glass and did his best to chug it.

At first his body didn’t register what he was doing, and the liquid went down fairly easily. About halfway through, however, his taste buds registered the salty, stale taste of months-old sweat, and soon it was like the liquid was literally clawing its way down his throat. By the time he was at the bottom of the glass, it was like he had to fight to swallow each individual drop to keep it from coming back up, but with one final cringe he gulped the last mouthful, putting the glass down in front of him in triumph.

He caught a fleeting glance of surprise from Mel, but she quickly masked it as apparently this wasn’t all she had prepared. “Now your fries.”

Dillian couldn’t help but frown, realizing this was probably going to ruin his whole meal. His frown furrowed into disgust as he realized she was handing him a tube sock. It was white at one time, but was now entirely stained a horrid yellow that got progressively worse until it was almost black where the bottom/toes of Mila’s foot would have been, and instead of being filled with a leg/foot it was now filled with his French fries.

Taking the fetid article of clothing, he opened up the top end to realize the fries had absorbed portions of the sweat and grime that was in the sock, turning the usual golden fries slightly green. The taste wasn’t much better than the looks when he started eating either. Foot cheese was definitely not a cheese meant to make cheesy fries, and the deeper he got into the sock, the more the flavor increased, and the soggier the fries became. By the time he reached the sole of the sock, the fries were almost black from absorbing whatever was on the bottom of the sock, and Dillian was actually wishing he had some bra sweat left over to wash down the much worse taste and feel of the now slippery, grimy fries.

Nonetheless, with only a few moments where he had to stop or risk upchucking everything, Dillian was once again victorious, much to Mel’s chagrin. Although his stomach was in knots, and his tongue wanted to fall off, the rest of Dillian’s body was actually feeling pretty good, until he saw Mel grab his burger... And shove it down the back of her yoga pants.

Dillian could only watch in horror as she slammed her ass down on the seat next to him with an audible squishing splatter, smearing her ass all over the seat before finally stopping to--- PPPLLLLOOOOORRRRFFFTTT!!! “Aaawww...” With a contented sigh, Mel reached back and pulled the burger back out from her pants, and plopped it onto his plate. The thing was surprisingly still intact, and looked like it had been all steam-pressed down into a much flatter version of itself, burger, bacon, lettuce, and all. Visible stink lines came off of it, and Dillian was pretty sure the pool of liquid it was now sitting in was only partially (and a small amount at that) burger grease.

“There’s no way I’m eating that. That has nothing to do with Mila!“

“We’re twins, dumbass. Eating that is pretty much as close as you can get to Mila doing the same thing. If you really like her, you know how she is. Do you really think she’s NOT going to accidentally do that to your food some day? And you know I wouldn’t even let you THINK about pointing out what she did and making her feel bad about it! Anyway, would you rather taste something a bit more ripe from back there?”

Dillian blanched at the very thought, but looking back to the burger didn’t make it much better. Could he really do this? With all the enthusiasm of a death row walker, Dillian gritted his teeth and grabbed the burger. It was... smaller now, but even the feeling of the soggy bread against his fingers sent his skin crawling. When he finally built up the willpower again to take a bite... It was like “making out” with Mila’s ass all over again, if not worse. He couldn’t even taste burger. It was like the poor thing had become the embodiment of Mel’s butt. The sweat of her ass was the burger grease, the usual aroma of burger was replaced with nothing but fart smell, and the whole thing literally tasted like shit.

Dillian was literally fighting back tears as he forced his way through the vile “food”. Doing his best not to think about it, he actually bit the tip of his fingers before he realized he had done it. Somehow he had forced the ass burger down. He had beat Mel. He turned to beam at her triumphantly, only to see her holding something out of a nightmare. “Don’t forget your desert! Hahaha!”

What was dangling from the prongs of a fork in Mel’s hand was the remnants of a thong. The thing looked like it had once been a light color of some kind, maybe even white, but any trace of that original color was now long gone. The thing was dripping what he could only hope was sweat all over the table. The side straps were yellow, almost green from sweat, the front stained with a different shade entirely, along with off grey stains that had nothing to do with the original coloring. Finally, the back was... well it was brown. And green. And every color in between. It was smeared with what could only be absolute filth.

Mel could only laugh maniacally at Dillian’s look of absolute horror, he victory all but assured by his face alone. But something about the sneer she had on, the cruel laugh, the evilness in her eyes... Something caused Dillian to snap. Faster than even he could register what he was doing, the thing that used to be a thong was in his mouth, and with a gulp... It was gone.

Both Mel and Dillian sat in shocked silence for what seemed like an eternity at what had just transpired. “W-wow... I guess you really do...”

Suddenly, it was like everything he had just ate hit Dillian at once, the monstrosity of his “desert” hitting him like a baseball bat to the face. “BATHROOM!”

With a strength he didn’t know he had, Dillian practically lifted Mel out of the booth, leaving her standing and staring after him as he bee-lined to the bathroom with all intent of purging every bit of his meal.

In a blur, Dillian burst into the bathroom, swinging open the first stall and diving face first into-- Mila’s butt.

Mila had barely made it to the bathroom before she had quite literally exploded.
