Justin blinked a few times, trying to remember what he could have ordered, and failing to find a memory, tried to think of an occasion for him to get something sent as a present, with similar failure. Nonetheless, he could only shrug as he signed for the package--

"Thanks. Alright boys, go ahead and put it together!"

--which turned out to be more than a few packages...

Justin watched in bewildered amazement as a crew of men started carting in box after box, apparently deciding to use his living room to put together some sort of... machine? In an undetermined amount of time, they seemed to finish... Leaving some sort of pod type contraption big enough to fit him standing inside of it...

"Oi, almost forgot... Here ya go, sir. Have a good one!" With that the delivery person handed Justin a letter, and him and his crew disappeared almost as quickly as they had shown up.

Still utterly confused, and having missed his opportunity to ask the crew what the hell this all was, Justin just opened the letter in hopes of finding out... And was not disappointed.

"Hey man, it's Ky! How's it goin'?" Justin couldn't help but narrow his eyes slightly as he read the opening line. Sure, he liked Kyle well and good, but... Bad things always seemed to happen when they were together. Nonetheless, he continued reading. "So... I know we haven't hung out in a while, and an acquaintance of mine you don't know yet, Serenity, invented a little something and... Well I was really tempted to use it, but she likes to set traps for me, so... I'm giving it as a gift to you! She doesn't really care about other guys so you should be fine!" Justin was feeling more and more dubious, but he forced himself to continue. "So I know you've always wanted to visit the middle ages, right? Well this thing is kind of a... Time continuation simulator? I don't know all the details, but you should be able to go ahead and visit that time! I guess it's set up so you only have to press the button inside and you should be good to go! Anyway, hope you like it, and don't have too much fun without me!!!" Justin scowled as he finished reading. Sure, he'd love to visit the middle ages, but... Was it really worth the risk? He leaned back to rest his back against the device... Only to find nothing behind him!

In the second in took him to fall back, he realized he had meant to lean against the door, only to have it automatically open, sending him reeling and trying to catch his balance as he stumbled inside and... rammed into a console with a flailing hand... hitting some sort of button as the doors slammed back shut. Justin could only stand mouth agape in horror as the machine seemed to awaken, his eyes falling onto the bottom part of the letter... "P.S. Serenity sometimes has a little TOO much fun with her inventions, so... Hopefully nothing too weird happens... USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!"

"Damn it, Ky..." Blinding light filled the small capsule, and soon Justin couldn't hold onto consciousness any longer...

-------------------------------------

"-the hell did this one come from, then?"

"Do not look at me... The outer walls are impossible to get through, so... He must have been trying to escape from within?"

"But... Have you ever heard of a male being in this prison, let alone a... cute one like this? He would never survive."

"Well... No... I mean, it IS a female prison, you dolt."

"But then why would he be from inside?"

"How should I know? Anyway... Our shift is almost over, can we not just toss him back in and let him fend for himself?"

"Hmm... I suppose you are right, good luck little one."

Justin could barely keep his consciousness from fading again, let alone comprehend what the hell was going on as two burly (and quite frankly quite smelly) women dragged him before throwing him to the ground, a large iron gate slamming itself in place before he could even muster enough strength to sit up. "W-wait, hold on! What's going on, where the hell AM I?"

"Ock, as if you do not know..."

"I don't! My friend sent me some kind of device, and I--"

"What is he going on about?"

"Dunno... Poor thing must be raving mad. 'Only logical if he has survived with... THEM."

"Aaawww, well in case you really forgot then... Welcome to "Widow Abbey", the place where all you filthy little females-- and well, I guess you-- go to spend the rest of your lives. Enjoy your stay!"

Justin tried to grasp what was going on, tried to rationalize how even something as crazy as Kyle's device could lead to a situation like THIS, but all he succeeded in doing was missing his chance to ask more questions as the two guards walked away snickering. Looking down to see that he was in essentially burlap clothing, he knew that the machine must be working, but with no way to figure out if he was even still in it... "Could this have been a... ONE WAY TRIP?!?! DAMN YOU KYLE!!!" Just wanted to just sit here and scream, but he knew it wouldn't do him much good... No, he had to turn around, figure out what was going on, if he could get help, and if he could even SURVIVE this place... His apparently new home... "Widow Abbey".
14.title: Justin Path: New Adventures Are... Something Else

141.content:
Kyle grabed his backpack, lunch and sneaked out of his house early for school, looking both ways as if he was trying to hide from something, but as his feet hit the sidewalk a too familiar voice meant he failed in that attempt.
"Hey Ky-Ky!" A loud high pitched voice burst from behind him, but before Kyle could react he was tackled in a glomp-like hug that was bitter sweet. Bitter sweet because although Kyle dreaded being around this girl he couldn't help but slightly enjoy the feeling of her plump chest pressing themselves against the back of his shoulders due to her larger size then Kyle.

"H-hey Grace," Kyle said stuttering. Thankfully the enjoyment he got from her soft and warm hug let him speak because for some reason he found himself speechless around her, and not at good times either. It seemed as though whenever Grace disgusted Kyle, which was often, he was left mute and couldn't say a word for several minutes leaving Grace to think that he was comfortable around her. And this meant Grace rarely left his side since no one else would be friends with her... for several reasons.
Grace was a unique girl, she was tall and already full figured while only being in grade school, but what usually catches people's attention is her fluffy bear ears that protruded from her long bouncy brown hair. She seemed sweet and kind, her skin was pale and freckles ran across her nose and scattered themselves along her shoulders and thighs in a cute way. But female bears whether they be hybrid or anthro have a bad rep for being hulking hot heads and abusive, so most people avoid Grace just because of her intimidating stature and nationality, despite her generally thin frame, but those who get too close usually run off anyway after getting one whiff of her. She was a tomboy to most, but those who knew better knew she took that trait a step further and seemed to never bathe. If she did it was most likely only because she was starting to actually smell herself, which usually took weeks if not a month to actually happen. She also didn't seem to groom herself too well, her face and back had occasional acne and her armpits... well they were starting to show signs of puberty in more ways then one. As if to remind Kyle of this Grace swung her arm over his should and pressed him against her, shoving him in the stink cloud the emitted from under her arms.

"You're up early," she said as Kyle could barely speak as he gagged on Grace's smell. He then looked at her and her green eyes looked down on him before she gave him a mischievous smirk as she said, "You know what I want big guy, let me see it," almost in a suductive tone causing parts of Kyle to stir that usually never did around Grace.
"I want your lunch!" She then grabbed his lunch bag and continued to ask, "Oh! Your mom made you tuna and milk, can I have it!? Please..."

"Yeah sure, I think it-" Kyle was about to tell her that it went bad a couple days ago, but she already engulfed it giving him a quizzical look, waiting for him to finish his sentence, but he just said, "Nevermind."

"Well, see ya at lunch," Grace said as they reached the school and she stopped to hug him, pressing Kyle into her unrestrained chest that nearly filled her loose fitting flannel shirt. Once lunch rolled around Grace sat next to Kyle with her tray full to the brim of food, but she had a stressed look on her face and her forehead seemed to have a little more sweat then usual.

"Feeling okay Grace?"

"Yeah, my stomachs just a bit upset. But nothing to worry about, I think I'm just hungry."

"When aren't you? haha," Kyle said jokingly receiving a playful punch to the arm from Grace, unfortunately a playful punch still seemed to leave a bruise at her strength, which caused Kyle to rub the spot.

"Don't be a wuss," Grace said noticing Kyle rub the spot she punched, and while devouring her food she continued on to say, "So you coming over?" While nearly spitting food at him.

"Y-yeah, movie night right?" Kyle asked stuttering slightly as he struggled to speak as he watched Grace devour her food like an animal.

"Not just any movie, Horror Movie Night MWAHAHAHA!," She growled in an intimidating low voice that was actually a bit comical to Kyle.

"Oh? You sure you can handle that?"

"HA! I can handle anything," Grace said with a close eyed smirk, but as if to challenge her statement he stomach gave off a bubble water cooler type gurgle that caused her confident closed eyes to open in worry. *GGRRUUMMBBUUBBLLOORRB*
Both of them didn't bother to say anything, Kyle was slightly disgusted, and for once Grace was a bit embarrassed to show weakness, and worse, to show a much more disgusting side to her that Kyle hasn't witnessed yet.
Soon school was over and the two of them went straight to Grace's house, with her mom and older sister watching television. Both of them filled the couch to the fullest, and put its carrying capacity to the test as the cushions seemed to be flattened to non-existence. As they entered Grace's mother jumped from the couch in excitement to see Kyle while Grace's older sister seemed to look away and apply a bit of make up and bounce her curly black hair.

"Hey mom," Grace said as if she were embarrassed by how her mother acted, but her mother just couldn't contain her happiness that her daughter had a friend despite her uncouth nature.

"Hi dearie, oh and you brought your friend!" She then lunged at Kyle as if she were going to pounce on him, but instead hugged him, practically engulfing him withing her large frame. She seemed to be covered in perfume as if she was trying to smother a stench she's doing her best to hide, but the only thing she was currently smothering was Kyle with her enormous chest that nearly engulfed Kyle's entire head. And as she hugged him she began to stand and lifted Kyle nearly a foot off the floor as she said, "I'm so happy to see you!"

"Mom please, you're gonna suffocate him," Grace said nonchalantly, as if this happens every time. And hearing that caused her to drop Kyle back on his feet as he gasped for air.

"Sorry hun, I guess I don't know my own strength, I think it runs in the family haha. C'mon Wendy lets leave Grace alone with her boyfriend," She said causing Grace to uncharacteristically blush.

"Hey Ky! Good to see you," Grace's sister said, as she strutted over a bit flirtatiously and leaned forward and kissed Kyle on the cheek leaving a residue of red lipstick behind and as she drew back from her tiny kiss she continued to lean forward as if to give Kyle a view of her large chest that seemed to lay in clear naked view. But before Grace could punch her sister for being a flirt with her friend their mom grabbed the back of Wendy's shirt and dragged her away.

"Hey! I was just saying hi, why can't I stay!?" Wendy yelled at their mom, who simply retorted, "Because you can't behave yourself, now go to your room."

"Thanks mom," Grace said rolling her eye, still a bit frustrated with her family's welcome party and looked at Kyle and said "Ew! you got make-up on your face," causing Kyle to rub it off as they laughed.

Once they got settled in and started the movie, Kyle noticed that Grace seemed shook up by the scary movie especially since she was all over Kyle, grabing his arm and sweating. The sleeve of his right arm found itself under her's and was forced to soak up what seemed to constantly flow from her armpit. Soon that sweat seemed to mean something else as Kyle noticed her squirm in her seat as if she was uncomfortable, but before he could ask, her stomach answered the question.
*GGRROWWMMMBBUBBLE*

"Ooooh, I'm sorry Ky-Ky but I've been holding this in since lunch..." and with that said he knew what was coming but had no idea the caliber and strength of what he was about to witness.
PPPPPPPPPHHHHHLLLLUURRRRRAAAVVVVVVVVRRRFFFFFFFUUURRRRRRHHHT!

"Ahh... ehem," Grace sighed, but instantly replaced her bliss with shame, feeling as though she lost her only friend. Her fart rumbled the entire couch and caused the cushions of the couch to warm up to levels that made Kyle sweat, and Grace to sweat profusely. It was as if her single blast of gas turned the entire TV room into a sauna, a sauna that smelled like a the wet grimey corners of a dumpster. But to Grace's amazement, Kyle never said a thing, instead he continued to watch the movie as if nothing happened.

"Phew, that was big, ha, ha," Grace said with a nervous laugh trying to make the situation into a joke. But all she got outta Kyle was a, "Mmm-Hmm," in agreement as if his mouth was taped shut.
"You don't mind if I...?" Grace continued to ask, and Kyle once again remained silent, completely crippled by the disgusting smell that left him mute once again. "Good! Now I can finally enjoy this movie, all this gas has been making me sweat hahaha," she said actually laughing this time, feeling more comfortable around him then ever as she leaned to the side, nearly resting her left butt cheek on Kyle's lap as she occasionally let go crude and occasionally wet blasts that sometimes overpower the sound of the movie.
BBRROOUMMPPT!

PPVVVUUOORRLLLBBT!

FFFRROOUUMMVVVRRAAPPPPMMMAABBT!

The night went on this way as Kyle suffered speechlessly in Grace's nearly constantly building stench and as Kyle left Grace stood at the front door smiling and waving good bye, feeling as though they just became leaps and bounds closer to each other. Unfortunately this is when Kyle's father got a new job and they were forced to move, and as the years went by he couldn't help but remember Grace and her ability to leave him literally speechless. Even thinking about it caused him to soon realize that actions as gross as her caused other symptoms, much more intimate symptom that were 'hard' to hide. Getting a job back in his home town didn't help either, he went to the bus station that was in the middle of his old town and waited for the bus until a chill went up his spine as he heard an all too familiar voice.
141.title: Kyle Path: Start

1411.content:
After taking a few more moments to compose himself, Justin was eventually able to force himself to get up and look around what was apparently his home for the foreseeable future... And it wasn't looking fantastic, to say the least... Although the cell was actually fairly large, a surprising fact to Justin, the furnishings were practically non-existent. Two existed, both against the same wall. The first was what he could only assume was a bed, a metal framed, metal-spring undercarriaged monstrosity with a slab of a mattress that used to be white (but was now a terrible mix of yellows, browns, and greens) and was actually dripping a substance that Justin didn't even want to identify. The second item immediately at the foot of the "bed" was the rotted skeleton of a bench which sat above an equally abused rusty bucket. "Is that... the toilet?"

"Yep, and the likes of you better keep it tidy, cleaning day was today, so you have a week until the next one." Justin nearly jumped out of skin as a new guard suddenly barked from behind him. He opened his mouth as he spun around to plead his case about getting out of here, but as he spun he was left to stand mouth agape at what he saw.

An absolute monster of a woman stood next to the guard, who although she put up a good front yelling at Justin seemed a little afraid of the woman as well. Her skin was a deep crimson, and she stood somewhere between 8 and 10 feet tall, answering Justin's wonderings of why the cells were so large. A shock of long black hair adorned her head, the left half of her face almost completely blocked from view by the tangled locks. The other side was parted by a large horn that curved back slightly, its obsidian black surface somehow even darker than her hair and almost seemed to absorb the light around it. This allowed Justin to see her right eye, which practically shined with its yellow hue as it studied him closely.

Of course, all of this was practically forgettable when it came to the rest of her body, a perfectly hourglass figure pushed to the max... Barely concealed in what looked like it used to be something like Justin's current burlap sack garb, but what had obviously given up the fight long ago. Her breasts were jiggling like they had a mind of their own in what had practically become a ghost of a sports bra, or the closest thing you could make out of burlap. Down below, her pants had faired even worse, now little more than a loin cloth.

"Claudette, meet New Boy, New Boy, meet your new cellmate... Get along you two. Or, I suppose do your best to survive, New Boy. Hahaha."

Justin tried to lurch forward as the guard opened the gate to his cell, but this just got him a hard shove towards the back wall, the behemoth that was Claudette soon blocking any escape as the gate shut behind her. Justin sighed, deciding that the guard wouldn't have been much help anyway... Of course, he had much more pressing matters on his mind as Claudette moved over to the bed, plopping an ass that took up at least half the bed on its own with a hardy Ker-SPLAT SQUuuuiiissshhh...

For what felt like an eternity, Justin and Claudette stared at each other in silence, the only thing breaking it being Justin doing his best not to cough as an awful stench that could only be the giant "woman" in front of him. Trying his best not to stare at her body, Justin once again looked towards her face, noticing that her matt of black hair concealed more than just her face. The completely cracked and stunted remnant of her other horn's pair could barely be seen through the tangles, and even more interesting, a large scar that started just underneath the broken horn and continued all the way down to her chin. Where her other yellow eye should have been was an eye patch that was practically woven into her hair, the patch itself being made of a completely patchwork of small multi-colored cloths that should have clashed, but somehow... looked really good, or at least the small glimpses of it that Justin could see through the black tangles.

Soon the awkward silence became too much, and Justin couldn't help but panic. What was this "woman" in here for? How long was he going to be stuck in here with her? Was she going to KILL him?!?! His addled brain spun around in circles, until he desperately clung to one thought... It was always good to start of meeting someone with a compliment, even if they were a giant red demon looking woman in a jail cell... Right? "Y-your eye patch... It umm... It looks amazing on you." Justin felt like shooting himself the minute the words were out. Of all the things he could have said, he had to essentially mention what must have been a horrible injury! Well... At least he could take solace in the fact that if she DID decide to kill him, it would probably be fairly quick...

Kyle Choices:

1. It turns out to be Grace, and a "wonderful friendship" is rekindled!

2. It's Wendy, and she makes a move since Grace never did!/It's Grace's Mom, who misses having Kyle around almost as much as Grace and Wendy!
1411.title: Justin's Path: The New "Home"

14112.title: Wendy/Mom

141121.content:
"Kyle? Is that you?" said a woman who seemed to be holding back excitement. This caused Kyle to turn his head strictly out of instinct, because if his guess was correct then he'd rather not turn his head at all. As he turned around, his head was at thigh level to a woman, causing him to slowly tilt his head back and look at the woman who must have been just short of 8ft tall, but what truly sent a chill up his spine were the twitching furry bear ears that poked out from her long black hair.

"Um..." Kyle wanted to say 'Hi' but a rush of terrible memories came flooding back as he realized that it was Wendy... old, taller, larger, and curvier Wendy. Last time he saw her she was a dolled up little girl, but now, she's an absolute knockout. She wore a t-shirt that was probably supposed to be fashionably loose fitting but her large chest changed that and nearly made the shirt into her sports bra, which would probably would show some under-boob is not for the second shirt under that one that she had tucked into her leggings. Leggings that were essentially a second skin on her... and gave Kyle a good look at her nearly naked frame as the leggings clung to ever curve and dove into any crack... including the deepest crack on her body. Anyone with a viw from behind would nearly wonder how she plans on getting the leggings out of the deep crevasse that is her thick bouncing booty.

"Oh my god, oh my god, oh my god!" She said as if she just met a celebrity. "It is you isn't it!? It's been so long, you look..." she paused to try her best to think and choose her next word carefully "... good."

"Wendy? Wow yeah, it's been a long time." Kyle said as a mental sweat drop went down his face as he suffered through small talk, hopng that the bus would come early. But in the back of his mind, he couldn't shake how absolutely gorgeous Wendy was, and she never really interacted with him other then flirting so he didn't have much of a reason to try and avoid her.

And as if she knew what he was thinking she asked, "Hey! Are you waiting for the bus? Let me drive you, I was just on my way to my car. We'll get to catch up."

"Um, yeah sure. Thanks I appreciate-" But Wendy didn't wait for Kyle to finish, she simply grabbed his arm and pulled, showing him how much her strength has grown as well. Once they got to the car, it wasn't exactly what he expected. The first thing he noticed was that it was a VW beetle, which was kinda small for her, also... it was full of clothes.

"Ooooh yeah, I keep forgetting to go to the laundry mat, um..." she began to think realizing that her passenger seat and back were buried in dirty clothes. She opened the door and Kyle felt as though she just opened a gym locker as the stench of BO, grime, and sun-baked filth billowed from the car door causing him to swallow a lump in his throat as he wondered what he was getting into. "Here, I have an Idea." Wendy said as she directed him into the driver side seat.

Kyle sat, thinking he was going to drive once Wendy cleared out room for herself somehow, maybe was room for clothes in the trunk after all. But she didn't go anywhere, instead she followed Kyle and turned around bending over to fit herself in as well. For a moment time stopped, Kyle watched as the leggings rode up her calf nearly reach her knee as the fabric tried desperately to compensate for the added amount of pressure pressed against the rear of her pant as well as her thick thighs. The leggings came close to spitting, but instead, the wedgie that lived within the deepest part of her crack broke free and into the open air giving her seemingly inflating booty room to grow as she bent over. Then it happened... *THUD*

"There we go. A little snug but this should work," She said, and then repeated her last statement in a more seductive tone, "This should work just fine."

Kyle wanted to say something, but the newly freed fabric that was once taking residence within her over heated booty now rested... or better yet compressed itself on Kyle's lap, wafting the terrible odor that clung to it. Not to mention the fact that he was surrounded by Wendy's dirty laundry, so of which look as though they've never seen the laundry as a pair of panties found its home in the crevice of the seat.

"You're actually kinda comfy Ky-Ky. Sorry I've gotten a bit bigger hehe, you don't mind do you?"

Kyle wanted to groan, say 'yes', tell her to 'pull over', but this all became impossible as the stench wafting from her filth soaked clothes and her huge buns, that were currently burying his lap, kept him mute.

"Are you... excited? Is that why you're speechless?" She said, leaning back a bit, nearly resting her back against his chest and face. "Oh my god, it's true! My sister tried to tell me," she said forcing Kyle to sit in silence as just them memory of Grace made Kyle speechless.

"You actually like it when girls show you their... true colors," she said in a gitty tone as if she just solved a mystery. "My sister tried to tell me that you were the only one she knew who didn't mind when she... showed off. Well, I think we're gonna be close friends then, actually even me closest friends don't know about my true self... so I guess we'll be a little closer." She said, saying her last statement in a slow flirtatious tone that made Kyle sweat a bit. Kyle was starting to get anxious, he felt trapped, and wasn't even sure where Wendy was driving him, since he never told her where he worked, so in an attempt to escape he began to squirm and fight with his legs the were buried under Wendy's massive thighs and butt cheeks.

"Ooh? You wanna get closer? I can help you." She said clearly misunderstanding his intentions. She then grabbed his hand and brought it to her breast, Kyle actually enjoyed this for a second as is hand sunk into the warm pillow like breast, but thin he felt her put his hand under both her shirts and could feel the coating of sweat that practically dripped of her breasts and collected into a film within the space under her boob. "Oooh, very good Ky... just don't... don't rub too... you're gonna..."

Kyle barely understood her as Wendy got lost within Kyle's gasp of her large breast, and the rub down he was giving to the sweat filled space between them. It was that sensation that sent Wendy over the edge, forcing her to pull over as she fell back HARD, pressing his face against her back as she grabbed his other hand and began working her other breast. Was she going too...?

"I'm gonna, I'm gonna...!" Wendy couldn't even speak anymore as she simply moaned, but the thing she kept from saying was the only thing Kyle was curious about until it happened.
BBBBRROOUUMMMPPVVVLLRRRRAAAT!

PPPHHHHVVVVVLLLUUUURRRAAAMMMFFFFFT!

BBLLOOOUURRR - PPPFFFRRRAAAMMPPPRRRT!

"Phew... sorry Kyle, that got a little carried away..." Wendy said, out of breath, completely ignoring her violent bursts of gas since her mind was on other matters. Juices dripped from between her legs and completely stained the front of her legging, causing them to nearly appear see-through. All the while, her armpits now dripped with sweat after exerting herself, and Kyle was left under her forced to soak up any sweat and wetness that dripped off her.


Justin's Next Options :

Option 1 : Justin's new cell mate becomes infatuated with him, wanting him to be by her side, with her when she sleeps and while she goes through her other daily routines.
